that is relived by the body & mind *end* 

More and more people are experiencing working with someone with 
multiple personalities *end* However very few multiples ever discover more 
than the front parts of their systems *end* Very few people outside of the 
programmers have much idea of what an entire system of alters is like 

therefore some of the things that this book will describe will seem foreign 
to those people who have learned a little about multiplicity *end* 

There are several models to describe what happens inside a multiple’s 
brain as it develops multiple personalities *end* The brain is very complex *end* 
Recent brain research confirms that the brain was far more complex than 
imagined *end* In an average brain there are  individual neuron 
nerve cells *end* Each of these has  with  zeros following it worth of 
interconnections *end* In other words an average brain has vastly more 
interconnections than the total number of atoms in the universe *end* Often 
about / million different chemical reactions take place every minute in 
the average brain and the number can be several times that during intense 
activity *end* 

A Monarch’s brain has been worked on to be even more active than a 
normal person’s brain *end* The left & the right side of the Monarch’s brain 
both work simultaneously and the various personalities are all busy 
working simultaneously on different tracks *end* 

To describe the complexity of what is happening with someone’s mind 
which has been messed with so dramatically for years means that at times 
only an approximate model is presentable *end* There are several terms which 
are used in speaking about multiples which have developed several 
meanings *end* Unless these terms are correctly defined misconceptions about 
them can cloud an understanding of what happens during Monarch 
programming *end* 

First researchers have discovered that deep within a person the brain truly 
understands in a pure awareness all about itself *end* This is true for everyone *end* 
This pure awareness has been named various names including Hidden 
Observer *end* If a man is obnoxious and seems to have a total lack of 
awareness that he irritates people; just know that deep down an awareness 
realizes exactly what he is and what he does *end* The multiple’s brain at some 
deep awareness knows what has happened to it *end* 

The term Hidden Observer is fraught with danger though *end* A demonic 
entity called the Hidden Observer works hand in glove with the 

programmer to program the individual *end* The Hidden Observer is able to see 
everything the System does *end* The people who control as slave frequently 
call up the Hidden Observer to ask questions *end* In this case it is a demonic 
entity and yet it is this Hidden Observer which each System has that

Observer only tells the truth to its Master because it is demonic *end* 

The next term which is misunderstood is the term "the core" *end* The 
programmers set up various alters to pretend to be the core and the core’s

The Types of Trauma

One thing discovered by research into the genetic transmission of learned 
knowledge by humans to their children was that people are born with 
certain fears *end* Snakes blood seeing internal body parts and spiders are all 
things that people are born fearing *end* The phobias toward these things are 
passed down genetically from one generation to another *end* In searching for 
traumas to apply to little children the Programmers found that these 
natural phobias which occur in most people from birth will work 
"wonderful" to split the mind *end* Along this line the following are samples of 
traumas done to program slaves

a *end* being locked in a small confined spot a pit or cage with 
spiders and snakes 

b *end* being forced to kill and cut up and eat innocent victims

c *end* Immersion into feces urine and containers of blood *end* Then 
being made to eat these things *end* 

These are standard traumas *end* Often a slave will experience not only all of 
the above but many others before they reach  or  years of age *end* It is 
important to traumatize the child early before it has a chance to develop its 
ego states *end* By the way when the child is placed into a small box with 

spiders or snakes they will often be told that if they play dead the snake 
will not bite them *end* This carries out two things for the programmers it lays 
the basis for suicide programs i.e *end* "if-you-are-dead then you-are-safe" 
thinking and it teaches the child to dissociate *end* 
Traumas to split the mind are not just high voltage or natural phobias but 
encompass the full range of the emotional and spiritual being of the victim *end* 
The victim is eventually stripped of every spiritual or emotional resource 
by a variety of traumas such as "blood orgies" where male and female 
genitals are cut torture sessions on all types of medieval torture machines 
staged events where actors imitating God Jesus Christ police and 
therapists curse the victim reject the victim and even "kill" the victim in 
simulated drug deaths *end* 

Children are placed in hospitals in captive abusive conditions *end* Children are 
tied to innocent children which are systematically and brutally killed while 
the children are made to believe that they are guilty for the child’s 
punishment *end* Near death experiences such as drowning have become an art 
with these abusers *end* Trained dogs monkeys and other animals are used to 
further traumatize the victims *end* 

An Illuminati slave will most likely have experienced all of the last few 
paragraphs above plus much more *end* Toby was one of the trained NOTS 
chimpanzees *end* He was trained to be sadistic *end* The other trained chimpanzees 
at China Lake included "Gabie" or Gabriel who tickled the victim while 
they were tied up; Rastice who had a toy chest with diamonds bracelets 
& a scepter which electroshocked; Zoro who could do anything mean;

the traumas and tortures are carried out by alters or persons who are 
sadistic *end*

Sensory deprivation forced labor poisoning and rape of every orifice of

Another type of sensory deprivation is done by placing the victim in salt 
water for buoyancy and weightlessness *end* Then the victim is fitted with 
sensitive sensors that shock the person if the victim moves *end* The shock puts 
the person back into unconsciousness *end* The brain is trained to stop all 
external body movement from the conscious mind *end* This type of sensory 
deprivation is used to place in the posthypnotic commands to do something 
at some future date far into the future *end* 

The program is placed into the mind at the same primal level that the mind

is used essentially on all Monarch slaves *end* 

Some of the traumas are done for specific medical reasons *end* For instance 
the person is starved by only allowing for instance  calories per day for 
say a small woman of  lbs *end* Sugar & proteins are severely limited so 
that the brain is starved into submission *end* Water deprivation which is

swells from lack of water *end* When the brain gets woozy & overheated it 
hallucinates and has a hard time remembering events *end* 

If water deprivation is combined with electroshock it makes it harder yet 
for the victim to remember anything *end* Heavy exercise along with long 
periods of little sleep - hours/day causes an overproduction of 
endorphins in the brain and victims begin to robotically respond to 
commands *end* This was done to co-author Fritz under the pretense of military 
"training" *end* The other author Cisco experienced it as part of her mind-
control *end* The brain under such stress may flip its functions from right to left 
& vice-versa *end* Hypnosis is easier when a brain is tired *end* 

Most victims remember being suspended upside down *end* This was honed to 
a fine art by Mengele with concentration camp victims while records were

tests supplied the data on temperature levels as consciousness faded *end* This 
information then was used later on in America to help the survival rate of 
children given the same trauma *end* Simply hanging a person upside down for 
one or two hours will begin to play tricks on the mind *end* 

The mind will begin to dissociate and will begin to reverse the primordial

What Occurs When The Mind Splits

During battles soldiers have been known to wall off horrible events with 
amnesia walls *end* Just like the soldier who walls off a traumatic battle scene 
where he sees his buddy disembowelled by a grenade so the child walls off 
trauma *end* However the soldier must only endure a relatively small amount of 
trauma compared to the children who are programmed under the Monarch 
trauma-based mind control *end* A soldier may remember his trauma by being 
triggered by something that reminds him of the trauma *end* 

Likewise the child victim will have things that trigger it too *end* One way of 
describing the split is to say that the child’s mind is saying "This isn’t 
happening to me its happening to some one else" and a split in the 
personality occurs *end* The new split will have the characteristics of what it split 
from *end* The programmer will ask the alter being tortured to create something 
in the mind when the split is created--such as "I want  white fluffy 
kittens." 

The programmer demons and the child’s creativity work together with the 
dissociation to create alters *end* Those  white fluffy kittens will have the 
characteristics and memories of what they were made from *end* However they 
are separated from each other by dissociation and they will be given their 
own script and own separate identity by the programmer *end* The dissociation 
between some alters who are co-conscious is not full blown amnesia *end* 

After the Programmer has instructed the child what alters he wants made 
when he tortures the child the Programmer will inject a truth serum to 
determine whether the correct alters were made and the correct amount *end* The 
child’s creativity is being guided by torture *end* The Programmer will often also 
call up the Hidden Observer and ask it what has happened internally in the 
mind of the victim *end* 

Another better way of looking at what happens is to understand that the part 
of the brain that records personal memory--that is the personal history 
memory section is divided up into little pieces by amnesia walls built to 
protect itself from the repeated traumas *end* Each section is walled off from 
another section by amnesia *end* Each trauma has an amnesia wall built around it *end* 
Each trauma memory is sectioned off *end* That walled off section is a piece of 
memory that will be identified and a hypnotic cue attached by the 
programmers that will pull it up to the conscious mind *end* And further if the 
programmers so desire it can be given a history a name a job and 
developed into a full-blown personality *end* 

It’s important to grasp that the entire mind is not sectioned off into parts *end* 
Some areas of the mind such as the area that holds skills & talents is 
available to all the alters who want to access that talent *end* The talent doesn’t 
belong to that alter but to the System *end* Autobiographical memory is 

remembered differently than simple facts & skills involving primitive parts 
of the brain *end* 

A sense of time & a sense of self are attached to autobiographical memories--
these things are stripped of an alter as it functions within the programming *end* 
Memory storage is also linked to the brain’s state of mind at the time *end* 
Hormones released at the time of an experience will modulate the strength of 
the memory of that experience *end* The limbic-hypothalamic system of the brain 
which consists of the amygdala hippocampus cingulate gyrus fornix 
septum certain nuclei of the thalamus and the Papez circuit has a central 
modulating part which interacts with peripheral hormones *end* Peripheral 
epinephrine will be released if the amygdala is electrically stimulated *end* The 
adrenal medulla releases epinephrine that is vital for memory storage *end* In 
other words there are hormones which help the brain remember or not *end* 

A particular talent is not used by every alter *end* A non-sexual alter an alter 
with an asexual identity is not going to access talents involved in sexual 
foreplay *end* This is because memories are both occurrent states & also 
dispositions and when a disposition is dissociated the alter must maintain a 
different set of dispositions *end* A three year child alter is not going to access 
abilities to write *end* To do so for these alters would mean attacking the amnesia 
walls which hold horrible memories *end* They would mean going against the 
programming with its penalties and their own understanding of "reality" 
which is the programmed story line that the alter has been convinced of 
under penalty of losing its life *end* 

To dissociate a memory and to take on a particular role and identity involves 
a constant re-interpretation of past events *end* It may also mean that the alter 
must contrive an interpretation of present events *end* The  year old may for 
instance see breasts but decide they belong to someone else in the system 
who they share the body with *end* This is in part dictated by the necessity of 
obscuring the pain of the trauma that separates the alter from the rest *end* 

Each day that the alter confronts reality they will face the threat that old 
memories will not agree with the story line created *end* For instance the 
handler’s sexual advances carried out in front of that asexual nonsexual 
alter must be misconstrued so that the illusion of not having been raped is 

continued *end* This is why normal life has a way of breaking down the multitude 
of lies and programming of the deeper alters which live in a fantasy world 
created during the programming *end* 

The deeper alters have never had the chance to experience life outside of 
their programming since they hold the body only at infrequent specialized 
moments which are disjointed in time *end* The alters created to be fronts to 
normally hold the body will be given lots of programming to help them hold 
onto certain denials so that they will find it necessary to ignore or 
reinterpret dreaded associations linked with dissociated memories *end* For 
instance a Christian front alter is sincerely very righteous and holy *end* The 
thought that this person technically the alter’s System of persons could 
have done the most horrible savage demonic activities is inconceivable *end* The 
memories of ritual are safely ignored because the reality would undermine 
everything the person is *end* 

This phenomena is not just seen in memory dissociation but also under 
hypnosis when a person accepts a suggestion which flies in the face of the 
reality they can see *end* If a person accepts the suggestion that there is no dog in 
the room they will struggle internally to maintain that illusion *end* If asked to 
walk on a collision course with the dog they will unconsciously move 
around it and if asked why they stumbled around the dog they will 
construct an artificial excuse which is accepted even though it is 
transparently implausible *end* 

One of the Monarch Programmers Orne called this "trance logic" *end* Trance 
logic are those ploys and strategies to maintain a dissociative or hypnotic 
hallucination *end* The frontal lobes of the cerebral cortex which are called the 
Brodmann areas no *end* - are responsible for a person’s own responses to 
circumstance--i.e *end* what some call "personality" *end* When the mind is split this 
natural personality is not erased but rather is a collected pool upon which 
various responses from it are attached to various personalities" *end* Damage to 
these Brodmann areas tends to give an overall effect of making the person 
passive *end* 

The programming is not designed to damage these areas only to control 
what emotions they contain are linked in memory to the various memory 

fragments that will be made into personalities *end* The reticular formation is the 
location of the brain’s mechanism which determines the state of 
consciousness all the way from alert to hypnotic trance to sleep to coma *end* It 
interacts with the frontal lobes and the rest of the brain *end* Each memory is a 
function of several parts of the brain working together *end* 

Memory is a function of alertness/state of consciousness reticular 
formation the emotions Brodmann Areas - the Thalami priorities 
given to memories and several complicated processes where the brain 
categorizes and interfiles the info with other remembered data *end* By building 
in amnesia walls between Event personal history memories and by 
producing altered states of consciousness the memories of a slave can be 
"nested" as the Programmers call it *end* "Nested" means that it is hidden behind 
several "locked doors" when the mind files the memory *end* 
Sometimes the person must go back to the altered state to recover a memory *end* 
The electro-shock also scrambles the brain’s filing of a memory so that it is 
filed in bits and pieces *end* Because of the use of electro-shock if memories do 
start surfacing they surface in pieces *end* Sometimes a complete memory will be 
held by thousands of parts who the mind must bring together to recover the 
full memory *end* It has been discovered that memory retrieval is best when the 
environment is identical to when the memory took place *end* If we memorize 
numbers underwater we will recall them better underwater *end* 

Another thing discovered about trauma memories is that they are stored in 
the sensory motor processes rather than just in the normal memory sites of 
the brain *end* These memories are called body memories and they do not lie *end* 
The False Memory Spindrome is way off base on their attacks but then all 
of us who know the real story realize that they are just a coverup damage 
control scheme of the CIA *end* 
The Core 

Let’s return to describing the "core" or that part of the brain which is intact 
at the beginning *end* If we pause to consider that a non-multiple person will 
experience struggles in their mind when simultaneous overlapping but 
conflicting desires meet in conflict--i.e *end* "should I lay in bed go to work or 

go fishing today?" 

A particular part of the brain a Synthesizing Self is capable of ordering 
such a conflict--it transcends all these conflicting ego states *end* A single 
Synthesizing Self in the brain is likewise responsible for the de-synthesizing 
of the ego states *end* The victim in order to appease the programmers sets up 
different and opposite alters relative to a single System’s needs *end* 

The formation of alters is systematically and intelligently guided by the 
programmers especially in the early stages *end* The alters are created to meet 
the needs of the System that the programmers impose upon it and not to 
adapt to an abusive parent *end* Some therapists have failed to see that alter 
formation is not natural but a maladaptive practice that is guided by the 
victim’s desire to please and its fear of the programmers *end* The pool of 
abilities will be shared in different combinations among the various alters *end* 
An alter may have an unique ability that consists of subsidiary traits which 
may not be unique but are shared by other alters *end* 

As a child develops if certain areas of the brain are stimulated then those 
areas grow *end* If they are not stimulated then the brain will not grow brain 
cells in the area *end* In other words experience shapes the way parts of our 
brains develop *end* The way brain cells grow--that is how they make their 
connections is believed by researchers to be the actual place that memory is 
held *end* The growth in connections in their meaningful ways creates 
meaningful patterns that make up memory *end* 

When memory storage occurs changes in terminals of axons ending on the 
dendrites occurs *end* Dendrite spines which look like trees develop *end* One tree 
dendrite spine might look like an oak in winter--another might look like a 
mass of seaweed *end* For various reasons as the brain of a multiple grows--it 
physically grows different than a normal person’s brain *end* The brain can get 
around what has been done to it in some ways but it needs to be borne in 
mind that we are not dealing with just bad memories--but brains which have 
had their physical makeup & functioning altered *end* 

It is interesting to see how each different alter has a different EEG profile *end* 
One of the primary brain areas affected by the torture and programming are 

the areas which store event personal history memory *end* These areas are the 
hippocampus and the cortex of the frontal brain lobes which work with the 
two thalamus *end* General knowledge is stored in the neocortex the grey area of 
the brain or the outer thin layer *end* 

The brain has practically no limit to memory *end* However it will select what it 
wants to remember and it will decide how it will file what it remembers *end* 
Hypnotic suggestions to "forget" something often simply means the person 
remembers the event--but labels the file "forgotten" *end* Slaves are always under 
hypnotic suggestions to forget what they have experienced--however 
usually the brain in actuality only appears to comply and then secretly 
records the event *end* Hypnosis will be dealt with in chap *end*

studied scents very carefully *end* The case at Loudon Fr *end* written about in

the smell of different flowers *end* Cinnamon is a widespread scent used in 
programming deeper parts in a system *end* The smell of faeces & urine is a

which is the scent element which triggers the human mind sexually *end* Moriah 
knows how to use the various scents incenses etc *end* Astral magic uses various 
perfumes *end*

The Use of Drugs

The science of Pharmacology drugs has given the Programmers a vast 
array of mind-altering and body-altering drugs *end* Some of the drugs are not 
used to directly alter the mind but to change the body make the skin 
burn or make the person vomit or some other reaction that can be 
harnessed to further their nefarious programming goals *end* If they want a 
little girl to develop breasts they might give her hormones *end* Neuroscientists 
are now familiar with chemicals which cause personality traits *end* If one 
wants to create raving paranoia simply provide the brain with too much 
dopamine in the emotional centers of the brain and too little dopamine in 
the seat of reasoning area of the brain *end* Reduce serotonin in the person and 
the person will be unable to connect disagreeable consequences with what 
provoked them *end* In other words they can’t protect themselves from danger *end* 

Thorazine was used regularly at the CIA’s Jonestown Guyana group 
control experiment *end* Survivors of Jonestown have testified as to its 
effectiveness *end* After this gruesome experiment in mind control came to its 
end with a massacre large amounts of drugs were discovered *end* Just one 
footlocker at Jonestown alone contained  doses *end* The authorities 
prevented chemical autopsies of the bodies to insure secrecy of this 
sophisticated concentration camp which was used for medical and 
psychiatric experimentation by the CIA *end* An examination of the drugs that 
are used in mental hospitals to alter the minds of patients offers a clear 
indication of what is being used in the Monarch Mind Control 
programming *end*

A Brief History of the Use

Religious groups shamans medicine men witches and cults have been 
using mind altering drugs throughout history *end* The medieval witches used 
potions of hemlock and aconite for their flying ointments *end* These are herbs 
natural drugs which will create delirium *end* Contemporary witnesses 
reported that covens during the medieval ages would apply the potion of 
hemlock and aconite to cause their new witch to go delirious and then 
would transport the person to the Sabbat where they would be told they 
flew there *end* 

The Haitian satanic Vodoun cult which has been manipulated by the CIA/
Illuminati has sorcerers called bokors *end* The Vodoun cult in Haiti is being 
used for trauma-based mind control *end* One of the items of the cult is to take 
the plant Datura stramonium and add this plant with other things *end* The plant 
is the active ingredient of a potent psychoactive drug the "zombi 
cucumber" which produces amnesia and a pseudo-death of the victim *end* The 
brain doesn’t die but the mind is shut off *end* The victim is brought back to 
life as a zombie--a slave of the bokor *end* The powder to create a zombi is 
called zombificant in French-creole *end* The ceremonies to kill and resurrect 
the zombie are full of magic and demonology also *end* 
Magic drugs and demonology have always gone hand in hand *end* Drugs 
remove the part of the will that prevents demonic possession *end* Drugs are 
considered powerful demonizing substances by the those skilled in 
Demonology *end* If demonic possession is seen as part of mind-control then 
cocaine hashish crack and some of the other drugs are part of the effort 
to enslave people *end* The power of magic to kill just as the power of faith 
can heal will be discussed in chapter  *end* In Basutoland in Drakersbergs 
the Zulu witchdoctors use drugs and trauma to create tokoloshes mind-
controlled zombie slaves *end* It is said that in recent years they are using less 
children and more baboons and monkeys to get tokoloshes *end* The point is 
that drugs have been and continue to be used by the occult world for 
controlling people *end* 
The intelligence agencies working through the U.S *end* government financed 
drug research *end* An example is that Dr *end* Beecher of Harvard University was 
given via the U.S *end* Army Surgeon General’s Office  to investigate 
"the development and application of drugs which will aid in the 

establishment of psychological control." Research into drugs for mind-
control began in  at Bethesada Naval Hospital in Maryland *end* A CIA 
report described this research as to "isolate and synthesize pure drugs for 
use in effecting psychological entry and control of the individual." At the 
California Medical Facility at Vacaville Dr *end* Arthur Nugent conducted 
research into drugs for mind control under the auspices of the CIA *end* The 
Bureau of Narcotics worked with the CIA to establish "safe houses" where 
drugs which were seized were given to victims *end* Some other hospitals 
which began working with the intelligence agencies with dispensing drugs 
for mind control include Mount Sinai Hospital Boston Psychopathic 
Hospital University of Illinois University of Michigan University of 
Minnesota Valley Forge General Hospital Detroit Psychopathic Clinic 
Mayo Clinic the National Institute of Health and Letterman Hospital in 
the Presideo CA *end* 

The military did drug research/programming at the Army Chemical School 
in Ft *end* McClellan AL and at the Edgewood Chemical Center *end* In  Dr *end* 
Louis Gottschalk working for the CIA suggested that addictive drugs be 
used to control people *end* Some GIs who became addicted to pain killing 
drugs were subsequently blackmailed by withholding the painkillers until 
they complied with the demands asked of them *end* Cocaine has been 
frequently given to Monarch slaves to get them addicted and give their 
handlers more control over them *end* There is spray cocaine and powdered 
cocaine etc *end* Because the Monarch slaves are used to haul drugs and to 
launder the drug money they are right in the middle of large supplies of 
drugs *end* If you hear the expression "The snow is falling" it is the Network’s 
lingo for cocaine *end* Cocaine is reported to give people a feeling of power 
and to act as an aphrodisiac *end*

Applications For Drugs In Programming

Drugs are used during programming *end* Although drugs used to assist 
programming mean nothing to the common person they each have a 
specific purpose within a certain type of programming *end* Some specific uses 
for drugs during programming include

a *end* putting people into trance
b *end* teaching alters to go deeper into trance to escape drug effects
c *end* enhancing the trauma
d *end* producing out of body experiences 
e *end* creating pain
f *end* creating blood vessels that hurt a pulsating pain that runs through the 
body
g *end* controlling histamine production
h *end* helping create illusions such as no hands no feet no face no head etc *end* i *end* teaching alters to stay in position
j *end* to assist other programming modalities such as high tech harmonic 
machines which implant thoughts *end* The machines are used in conjunction 
with designer drugs *end* k *end* Hormones for instance GnRH which regulates the physiology of the 
sexual growth and is given to speed up sexual growth *end* Other body 
developments may also be manipulated *end* l *end* to enhance or reduce memory
m *end* to build the image of the programmer’s power

At this point it is appropriate to point out that the personalities of a 
multiple do not respond uniformly to the same dose of the same drug *end* 
Understanding how a drug will effect particular alters is a science in itself *end* 
If an alter is holding the body it will receive more of the effect of a drug *end* 
Let’s say Paraldehyde is given to a multiple *end* A possible reaction would be 
that some alters will feel no effect some will be sedated to a drunken 
stupor and child alters may be unconscious or hyperactive *end* Chloral 
hydrate might put some alters to sleep while others remain wide awake *end* 
Sometimes the personality holding the body may fight the influence of a 
drug to keep the body *end* Prochlorperazine is sometimes given by therapists 
to help alters cope with nausea and vomiting *end* 

Most alters will be programmed not to accept drugs except from their 
master *end* Lithium suppresses alter switching in some systems *end* An alter to 
"protect" the system from the therapist’s helpful medications may develop 
"allergic" responses *end* Alcohol is a drug *end* The reaction of an alter System to 
it will again be varied *end* Child alters may become unconscious while the 
adult alters don’t even become inebriated by large quantities of hard 
liquor *end* Within males dangerous violent personalities may take the body *end* 
Within the medical world often an approximate correct dosage will work *end* 
However with the programming the doses must be extremely fine tuned *end* 

Some of the best skilled medical doctors and assistants help with the 
programming *end* The Illuminati will initially give the small child a small 
dose of a drug *end* They will chart its effect give it a urinalysis to see how 
long it stays in the body etc *end* This is just the testing stage they are not 
doing any programming *end* A number of drugs will be tested but only one at 
a time *end* They clear a child’s body of a drug before they give it another one *end* 
They prefer not to mix meds *end* They will start small to insure they don’t 
overdose and then increase the dosage until they notice the correct 
behavior pattern *end* This will be charted in detail on the slave’s chart *end* Each 
child’s body chemistry is different so the suggested dosages are only ball 
park figures which are not precise enough *end* If too much of a drug is given 
the programmers can easily turn a child into a psychotic basket case *end* 

One of the secrets of the Illuminati/Intelligence agencies is that they have 
secret antidotes for most medications which if they have to give them to a 
child then they will *end* They will use an antidote for instance to keep a 
child from going into heart failure *end* The Programmers will have some 
helpful drugs and herbs on stock too *end* It is reported that Glutamic Acid 
 mg *end*  times/day will take care of the intense headaches that alters 
get from lots of switching *end* Witch hazel leaves and comfrey root will help 
internal bleeding *end* 

a *end* putting people into trance

About % of the population can be placed into the somnambulistic the 
deepest hypnotic trance possible simply by giving them hypnotic drugs *end* 
The prior list on pages - gives over  dozen drugs that can be used to 

assist taking someone in hypnotic trance *end* Special drugs have been 
designed which will place someone into a deep trance very quickly *end* If an 
alter is not being cooperative when they are accessed they can be locked 
in place mentally and given a quick shot of a fast-acting hypnotic-inducing 
drug *end* One drug which was popular for programming was demerol which 
would be administered intravenously an IV *end* It takes about - minutes to 
take full effect after administration via an I.V *end* The dosage can be 
administered so that the effect remains until the programming session is 
over *end* It may be administered about every half hour if appropriate *end* Children 
will receive  to  *end* mg/kg dose *end* Another drug a truth serum also 
consistently works on people making them totally compliant to any 
directive *end* Under Baradanga people will give their bank account numbers 
and anything else a person might want *end* These type of drugs are almost 
sufficient in themselves to get compliance out of a person *end* If one realizes 
that these drugs are used in conjunction to torture elaborate systems of lies 
and deception trauma-bonds and all the rest of the sciences of mind-
control used in the programming it is easy to see how they are producing 
totally compliant human robots *end* 
b *end* teaching alters to go deeper into trance to escape drug effects and pain *end* 

Much of the training in this area is based upon the child’s horror and fear 
toward the all powerful master programmer *end* When the programmer wants 
the child’s alters to learn to trance deeper he will give a drug that the alter 
doesn’t like *end* The child’s alter will then be told to go deeper into the mind 
if they want to escape the effect of the drug *end* This enforces the dissociative 
state being trained for the alter *end* The suggestion or story line that is given to

Summary

As the reader can see the use of drugs in the Monarch Trauma-based Mind 
Control is extensive and requires skilled technicians nurses and doctors *end* 
Because of the long-held control by the Illuminati families over narcotics 
and drug manufacture/sales there is no difficulty for the programmers to 
get large quantities of secret designer drugs *end* The minor occult cults have to 
get by with a more limited supply of mind altering drugs unless they 
directly connect in with the bigger picture *end* The power of drugs to control a 
person’s life is not absolute--although someone who lives with a cocaine 
addict or alcoholic might disagree--but when coupled with all the other 
methods in a sophisticated system of mind-control drugs just further 
reinforce the absolute power of the Illuminati over an individual *end*

Science No  - Hypnosis

Understanding the Basics About Hypnosis

A *end* Dissociation Trance and History of Hypnosis for Programming

Dissociation is used as a defense to protect a person from overwhelming 
pain and trauma *end* It is a natural ability of the brain *end* Hypnosis or hypnotic 
trance is a form of dissociation *end* There are a number of types of 
dissociation amnesia somnambulistic states localized paralyses 
anaesthesias and hallucinations *end* Hypnosis can reproduce all of these 
dissociative states *end* The mind naturally hypnotizes itself under various 
conditions *end* 

Perhaps the reader has been driving along a familiar road and the next 
thing you knew you were arriving home having driven in a trance *end* Now 
let’s suppose you are driving to a movie and you are discussing next 
week’s plans with your wife *end* The complex thinking required to drive just 
happens *end* You are awake talking to your wife and yet on another level you 
were in trance driving the car *end* You as a subject were both in hypnotic 
trance driving and awake talking about plans *end* 

There are  levels to the subconscious that the mind will naturally 
dissociate to *end* The other deeper levels require help to access *end* People 
naturally can think on two levels *end* Because people’s minds function on 
multilevels and there is a continua on a spectrum that runs from conscious 
to unconscious it is often difficult to pinpoint just exactly what state of 
mind the brain is in at a certain point because there is no single answer *end* A 
light trance is where a person is daydreaming about his girlfriend *end* A 
moderate trance is where he imagines he is in bed *end* A deep trance is where 
he physically feels he is in bed with his girlfriend *end* Sleep is where one 
dreams of being in bed *end* Behavior modification is carried out in the light to 
deep trances *end* The deep trance is a very creative level *end* 

Hypnosis appears to affect several areas of the brain--the brain stem is 

modified into the hypnotic state and the midbrain centers are inhibited so 
that other areas--the motor sensory and memory areas can be manipulated *end* 
Further not all hypnosis works the same way *end* Hypnosis can be used on the 
intellectual part of the mind the social-spiritual part of the mind and the 
primitive reproductive part of the mind *end* 

The skilled hypnotist will decide which area he wants and how to work 
with that area *end* Both Christians and Illuminati members who are skilled in 
understanding demonology believe that there is a demonic side to 
hypnosis also *end* It should come as no shock to people that in the World Book 
Encyclopedia hypnosis is listed under Magic as a related article but not 
under Medicine *end* Some Christians class hypnosis as a form of divination 
and enchantment *end* It certainly can be a form of control *end* In occultist W.B *end* 
Crow’s book Witchcraft Magic & Occultism it lists hypnotism as an 
occult science *end* 

There is open debate whether hypnotism is simply part of the brain’s 
natural abilities or if supernatural elements are part of the process *end* There is 
no debate that historically hypnosis for centuries has been the guarded 
secret of the occult world *end* 

During shock or stress the body’s limbic-hypothalamic-pituitary-adrenal 
system releases substances which encode all the internal and external 
pieces of information being sensed into a deep level of consciousness *end* 
These memories often become dissociated from normal states of 
consciousness *end* In other words when the mind-body returns to this state 
where it was in during shock/stress the mind can reaccess those 
memories *end* However until the mind returns to this shocked state it doesn’t 
pick up the information it has embedded *end* 

The Monarch programmers are acutely aware of how the mind functions 
and how information and memories can be trapped in the mind *end* There are 
different neurophysiological states *end* Also there are said to be  levels to 
the subconscious mind *end* Then on top of this the mind has the ability to 
create amnesia barriers *end* Hypnosis is a valuable tool to move the mind to 
different neurophysiological states and to get the mind to different levels 
of the subconscious mind *end* Hypnosis can also play a role in working around 

amnesia since both are types of dissociation *end* Hyperventilation helps a 
person induct into a hypnotic trance *end* Torture depersonalization fear and 
acute anxiety stimulate the body to hyperventilate *end* So the fear torture and 
depersonalization are aids for the hypnotist to help induct a person into a 
hypnotic trance *end* 

Hypnotic cues can be given to cause the body to go into various 
dissociative states *end* This could be a post-hypnotic suggestion that causes 
hyperventilation and an accompanying trance state *end* Hypnotic cues that are 
tied to every day objects enhance the programming *end* Everything in life 
becomes a cue to reinforce the programming *end* That may seem on the 
surface to be an exaggeration but it is only slightly enlarged from the 
truth *end* 

The programmers do in fact examine a person’s life and then tailor their 
cues to what the person will be around *end* For instance the programmer may 
force the child to smoke and then tell it that every time they blow out 
smoke they will think about their master *end* The programmed alters don’t 
dare not to smoke on fear that they will be punished *end* The smoking in turn 
reinforces the power of the hypnotist/master *end* 

Much of the good that therapy can do is in effect to de-trance or 
dehypnotize clients *end* Most of the alters of a Monarch system go their entire 
lives in trance *end* Common objects in a person’s life that can be hypnotically 
given a programming meaning include music tones colors the sight of a 
book or Bible the pyramid on the back of a dollar bill pictures of God 
silk scarfs jewelry lights sounds TV programs and countless other 
things *end* The limit to this is simply the programmer’s creativity *end* 

The power of hypnosis is often underrated because the power of the mind 
is underrated *end* The mind can decide to control its breathing heart beat 
blood pressure and other things that were once thought to be involuntary *end* 
The brain produces a substance which is a tiny peptide molecule called 
enkephalin which acts just like morphine and reduces pain *end* The brain can 
be hypnotically trained to release enkephalin so that the brain doesn’t 
perceive pain *end* 

A common hypnotic device for washing away pain is running water *end* The 
victim is hypnotically told to go to a waterfall and wash their pain away *end* 
According to a programmer the average healing rate is  times quicker 
under hypnosis than without *end* 

The fantastic abilities of the mind to control what happens to it are very 
remarkable such as its natural healing abilities but most of this is being 
kept a National Secret so that it can be used against humanity to enslave us 
to demonic-empowered power hungry monsters rather than to benefit 
humanity *end* Several people in intelligence agencies quietly bemoan the fact 
that secret research could be helping humanity instead of controlling it *end* 
The human mind has been found to be like an immense symphony 
orchestra each part doing what it does best under the guidance of a 
director part similar to the conductor of an orchestra *end* 

A non-multiple’s brain delegates responsibility to parts of his brain yet 
retains control over the process *end* His mind will shift from one ego state to 
another & still retain its identity *end* In contrast the multiple’s brain also 
delegates responsibility and shifts from one ego state to another BUT 
doesn’t retain a "cohesive selfhood or self-identity *end* The mental 
mechanisms are similar but the experience is vastly different *end* Rather than 
an orchestra playing together the multiple’s brain is full of competing 
isolated parts instruments so to speak that are playing in isolation *end* 

Out of the chaos of all these independent amnesic parts the programmer 
through hypnosis/& fear then becomes the conductor to help bring order 
out of chaos *end* If the multiple is to regain a chance to orchestrate their own 
life again they must re-establish communication between the different 
parts of what should have been their own orchestra and get internal people 
to harmonize their music of life *end* 
Good programmers do not need to formally induct their victim into 
hypnosis *end* However if they need to the Monarch slaves are well 
conditioned to respond to numbers being counted and fingers being 
snapped *end* Hypnosis was a well developed art by the early  century *end* 
And testing and refining continued all along *end* For instance the *end* U.S *end* 
military was conducting extensive tests of subjects under hypnosis during 

W.W *end* II *end* In spite of all this the CIA was still seeking better rapid 
induction techniques for their slaves during the s *end* MK Ultra 
Subproject  dealt with rapid induction techniques especially 
Subproject - *end* Some of their drug testing was done at Lexington KT 
Detention Hospital *end* 

The ability to distinguish between magic and hypnotism may not exist for 
the child in situations where they are witnesses to the power of hypnotism 
exercised by a programmer *end* This makes the adult programmer who is a 
big person look all powerful *end* 

Another danger inherent in hypnosis are complications side effects that 
hit a percentage of those who are subjected to it *end* Hilgard  discovered 
% of the  university students participating in a study of hypnosis had 
complications that lasted from  min *end* to  hours after trance which 
included headaches dizziness nausea and stiff necks *end* Fritz is aware of one 
woman who after the one & only hypnotic session she was the subject of 
developed the complication of having nightmares of snakes crawling all 
over her *end* For further study the reader may want to read MacHovec Frank *end* 
"Hypnosis Complications Risk Factors and Prevention" American 
Journal of Clinical Hypnosis *end* Vol *end*  No *end* July ’ p *end* + *end* 
Regular gentle electrical stimulation in many parts of the brain including 
the lower part of the reticular formation can change the state of 
consciousness from alert to sleepy *end* An electrical band attached to a box is 
sometimes placed on the victim to produce a hypnotic state *end* 

There are several ways to alter a person’s state of consciousness but the 
most popular one by Monarch handlers is to use a combination of drugs 
and hypnosis *end* Drugs are used to facilitate hypnosis *end* Modern drugs do 
almost all the work for the hypnotist *end* They place the person in an altered 
state and make them willing to take any order *end* Often survivors remember 
orange or grape drinks or something else which they were given which 
were used to give the child drugs *end* One Monarch slave Cathy O’Brien 
wrote about having been given hypnotic drugs via a Grasshopper ice cream 
drink *end* 

Occasionally hypnosis must be carried out by the programmers on 
unwilling subjects *end* They have  major ways to get around this *end* They can 
induce hypnosis by disguising what the hypnotist is doing they can wait 
until the person is asleep and talk to him while asleep or they can 
administer drugs *end* Also the Network has some high-tech equipment which 
stimulates the orgiastic state sexual ecstasy part of the brain *end* By moving 
the body into this state the mind opens up all the unconscious states *end* Then 
sophisticated brain wave machines program thoughts into the person *end* A 
computer disk is put into the electric shock machine and it runs a program 
that sends electric jolts down six nodes *end* The brain’s reticular formation 
serves as the brain’s mechanism involved in regulating alertness and 
awareness *end* 

Various kinds of stimuli will enter the brain through its various methods of 
sensing and learning *end* With total sensory deprivation done by placing the 
victim in a salt water tank with electrodes that shock the body until it stops 
all movement the reticular formation will place the mind into a primitive 
state of consciousness where the programmers can place in post-hypnotic 
commands to do something on a certain date *end* The end time programming 
that has Monarch slaves doing something at a specific date to create 
anarchy or to help the Anti-Christ come to power has been put in at this 
level *end* 

As previously mentioned this level achieved by total sensory deprivation 
of the Monarch slave is same primitive level as the brain’s commands to 
keep the heart beating *end* Depending on what type of signals are coming in to 
it from the various sensing agents of the brain the reticular formation will 
then make a decision what state of consciousness to place the mind in *end* If 
the reticular formation does not send out "alert" signals then the brain will 
get sleepy *end* Damage to the reticular formation can cause a coma *end* The two 
thalamus lie just above the brain stem *end* The right and left thalamus are the 
brain’s selective attention mechanism *end* That is to say they decide what it is 
important for the brain to focus its attention on *end* The right thalamus is 
connected to attention to visual shapes and the left to our attention to 
things describable in words *end* Ten to fifteen repetitions at one second 
intervals are enough to cause the brain to lose interest in something *end* At this 
point the neuron’s in the reticular formation quit paying attention to 

whatever it is *end* For instance your brain will listen to a clock tick for only 
 intervals before it quits listening to a clock in the room *end* But the brain’s 
alertness can be reactivated by a strong and sudden stimulus like a loud 
sound or a flash of light *end* This is why  gunshots or  flashes of light are 
used as standard access triggers for Monarch slaves *end* Three was also found 
to be the best number to get the job done *end* 
The History of Hypnosis for Programming

A masonic magazine for higher masonic rites where sex magic is 
performed entitled Freemasonry Universal Vol *end*   p *end*  states

"Certain Forces are sent through the candidate’s body during 
the ceremony especially at the moment when he is created 
received and constituted an Entered Apprentice Freemason *end* 
Certain parts of the Lodge have been heavily charged with 
magnetic force especially in order that the Candidate may 
absorb as much as possible of this force *end* The first object of 
this curious method of preparation is to expose to this 
influence those various parts of the body which are especially 
used in the ceremony *end* In ancient Egypt there was another 
reason for these preparations for a weak current of physical 
electricity was sent through the candidate by means of a rod or 
sword with which he was touched at certain points *end* It is partly 
on this account that at this first initiation the candidate is 
deprived of all metals since they may very easily interfere 
with the flow of currents." 

Long story short the Masonic lodges have been using hypnotism and 
electric shock in their initiation rituals for a long time *end* The combination of 
fear and hypnotism combine to help seal the lips of an initiate from telling 
what in some lodges are secrets of criminal activity *end* 

The Brahmin caste in India practice yoga and other meditations where 
they regularly go into altered states of consciousness *end* Centuries ago the 
Brahmin fakirs learned about drugs tortures and magical methodologies 
to produce hallucinations and altered states of consciousness *end* The worship 

of Bacchus in the west and Shiva in the east were similar as were the 
bloodthirsty rites of Kali and Moloch *end* Occultists in India have also gone to 
cemeteries for centuries like the Illuminati to draw spiritual power from 
graves *end* 

When eastern and western occultists linked up they realized they had a 
great deal in common *end* The ancient egyptian writings many centuries B.C *end* 
talk about the third eye and temple trances *end* Hypnosis appears to have been 
practiced in these ancient temples *end* All over the world altered states of 
consciousness have been used *end* The feared Scandinavian warriors called 
Beserkers were in a mildly-programmed altered state of consciousness 
which made them fearless *end* 
B *end* How To Program With Hypnosis

George Estabrooks was the first major hypnotist to publicly recognize the

which is an entry-level group for the Illuminati *end* 

For those who haven’t studied this it would be appropriate to give a brief 
explanation of these things *end* The Illuminati in  created the Royal 
Institute of International Affairs RIIA *end* The Astor Illuminati family were 
major financial backers of the RIIA *end* Waldorf Astor was appointed to the 
RIIA *end* The American equivalent to the RIIA is the CFR *end* The RIIA and 
CFR set up Round Table Groups based on the King Arthur myths which 
were initially named by Cecil Rhodes "Association of Helpers" *end* High 
ranking Mason/Illuminatus Cecil Rhodes also created the Rhodes 
Scholarship to bring select men from several the English speaking world 
and Germany to learn how to bring in the One World Government that the 
Illuminati has long had planned *end* The Cliveden Estate of the Cliveden 
Astors of the Illuminati has played an important role in the preparation of 
Rhodes Scholars *end* Bill Clinton and Fred Franz the late president of the 
Watchtower Society are two examples of men selected for Rhodes 
Scholarships *end* Bill Clinton went through the program *end* However Franz 

decided not to go to London in order to help lead C.T *end* Russell’s cult as 
"oracle" after WT Pres *end* C.T *end* Russell was ritually killed on Halloween 
 and his remains buried under a pyramid *end* He later served as President 
himself from - *end* The Watchtower Society leadership is a front for 
a part of the Illuminati which practices Enochian Magic *end* 

The power of Enochian magic is the Watchtowers *end* A powerful part of 
Bethel headquarter workers are Multiple Personalities and have cult alters 
who speak in Enochian *end* Some multiples work in the art department and 
have been secretly placing hidden occult symbology into Watchtower & 
Awake *end* magazines *end* 

Now back to Estabrooks who was also himself part of the Illuminati *end* In 
his book Hypnotism which came out in  he wrote in his chapter 
"Hypnotism in Warfare" again bear in mind that Estabrooks writes this in 
 and has been advocating what he writes for perhaps the  previous 
years *end* This chapter is not taken from a mystery novel *end* 

The facts and the ideas presented are so to speak too true to be good but 
no psychologist of standing would deny the validity of the basic ideas 
involved *end* He might of course be somewhat startled at our proposed use of 
these basic ideas and techniques for he has never given this matter much 
thought... *end* The use of hypnotism in warfare represents the cloak and 
dagger idea at its best--or worst *end* Even if we did know the answers to some 
of the weird proposals in this chapter those answers could never be given 
for obvious reasons *end* The reader must use his imagination for specific 
outcomes in specific cases have not been made public--probably never will 
be made public *end* 

Any topflight physicist is familiar with the basic laws of atomic fission and 
he is quite free to discuss those laws *end* But he may or may not know what is 
happening on some government research project in this field *end* If he does 
know he is not shouting it from the housetops probably not even 
whispering it to his best friend *end* The same applies to hypnotism in the field 
of warfare *end* Our interest here lies in some of the more unfamiliar sides of 
hypnotism which may make it of use in warfare *end* Again no psychologist 
would deny the existence of such phenomena... *end* 
The only possible way of determining whether or not a subject will 
commit a murder in hypnotism is literally to have him commit one... *end* But 
warfare...undoubtedly will answer many of these questions *end* A nation 
fighting with its back to the wall is not worried over the niceties of ethics 
like Nazi Germany *end* If hypnotism can be used to advantage we may rest 
assured that it will be so employed *end* Any "accidents" which may occur 
during the experiments will simply be charged to profit and loss a very 
trifling portion of that enormous wastage in human life which is part and 
parcel of war... *end* One in every five adult humans can be thrown into the 
hypnotic trance--somnambulism--of which they will have no memory 
whatsoever when they awaken *end* 

From the military viewpoint there are a few facts which are of great 
interest *end* Can this prospective subject --this ‘one-in-five" individual--be 
hypnotized against his will *end* Obviously no prisoner of war will be co-
operative if he knows that the hypnotist is looking for military information 
nor will any ordinary citizen if he suspects that the operator will use him to 
blow up a munitions plant *end* The answer to this very vital question is "yes" 
though we prefer to say "without his consent" instead of "against his will." 
We do not need the subject’s consent when we wish to hypnotize him for 
we use a ‘disguised" technique *end* 

The standard way to produce hypnotism in the laboratory is with the so-
called sleep technique *end* The operator "talks sleep" to the subject who 
eventually relaxes and goes into a trance talking in his sleep and 
answering questions *end* Now suppose...we attach a blood pressure gauge to 
the subject’s right arm and the psychogalvanic reflex to the palm of his 
hand just to make everything look shipshape *end* These devices are for 
measuring his ability to relax *end* We also point out that of course the very 
highest state of relaxation will be his ability actually to fall into a deep 
sleep while we are talking to him *end* 

We also stress the great importance of the ability to relax in this modern 
world of rush and worry promising to show him how to get results as one 
end of these experiments *end* All this is by way of buildup *end* Probably not one 
of our readers if exposed to this procedure would realize that this was 
preparation for hypnotism but would co-operate willingly in this very 

interesting psychological experiment *end* 

We then proceed to "talk sleep" much the same as in ordinary hypnosis 
carefully avoiding any reference to a trance or making any tests with 
which the subject might be familiar all the while checking on blood 
pressure and psychogalvanic reflex to keep up the front *end* 

Finally we make the test of somnambulism or deep hypnotism *end* We see if 
the subject will talk to us in his sleep without awakening *end* If this does not 
succeed the subject wakes up completely and in this case we simply 
repeat the experiment hoping for better luck next time *end* But if we do 
succeed if the individual belongs to the "one-in-five" club the subject is 
just as truly hypnotized as by any other method and from now on 
everything is plain sailing *end* 

By use of the posthypnotic suggestion...we simply say "Listen carefully *end* 
After you wake up I will tap three times on the table with my pencil *end* You 
will then have an irresistible impulse to go sound asleep." The next trance 
is just that easy to get and the subject has no idea that it is the pencil 
which has sent him off.".. *end* 

But we must go even further than this *end* Once a person has become 
accustomed to hypnotism has been repeatedly hypnotized it becomes very 
easy for any operator to throw him into the trance *end* Obviously this will not 
do if we are to use hypnotism in warfare *end* So we plug this gap again by 
suggestion in the somnambulistic state *end* We assure the subject that in the 
future no one will be able to hypnotize him except with the special consent 
of the operator *end* This takes care of things very nicely....We sit down with 
the subject...We are talking about the latest boxing match when the 
operator taps three times on the table with his pencil *end* Instantly--and we 
mean instantly--the subject’s eyes close and he’s sound "asleep." 

While in trance he sees a black dog come into the room feels the dog goes 
to the telephone and tells its owner to come get it *end* The dog is of course 
purely imaginary *end* We give him electric shock which would be torture to a 
normal person but he does not even notice it *end* We straighten him out 
between two chairs and sit on his chest while he recites poetry *end* Then we 

wake him up *end* He immediately starts talking about that boxing match *end* A 
visitor to the laboratory interrupts him *end* 
"What do you know of hypnotism?"
The subject looks surprised "Why nothing."
"When were you hypnotized last?" 
"I have never been hypnotized."
"Do you realize that you were in a trance just ten minutes 
ago?"
"Don’t be silly *end* No one has hypnotized me and no one ever 
can.’’
"Do you mind if I try?"
"Not at all *end* If you want to waste your time it’s all right with 
me."

So the visitor a good hypnotist tries but at every test the subject simply 
opens his eyes with a bored grin *end* Finally he gives up the attempt and 
everyone is seated as before *end* Then the original operator taps on the table 
with his pencil *end* Immediately the subject is in deep hypnotism *end* 

We now add another concept *end* We can coach the subject so that in the 
trance he will behave exactly as in the waking state *end* Under these 
circumstances we could defy anyone even a skilled psychologist to tell 
whether the subject was "asleep" or "awake." There are tests which will 
tell the story but in warfare we cannot run around sticking pins into 
everyone we meet just to see if he is normal *end* So rapid can this shift be 
from normal to trance state the programming state and so "normal" will 
the subject appear in trance that the writer has used such a subject as a 
bridge partner *end* He plays one hand in trance and one hand "awake" with no 
one any the wiser *end* This happens with Monarch slaves all the time *end* Few 
people ever catch on that alters are under trance *end* 
Suppose we deliberately set up that condition of multiple personality to 
further the ends of military intelligence *end* Let us start with a very simple 
illustration *end* For example we can hypnotize a man in an hotel in say 
Rochester *end* We then explain to him in hypnotism that we wish the numbers 
and state names of all out-of-state cars parked in the block surrounding the 

hotel *end* He is to note these very carefully in his unconscious mind but will 
have no conscious memory of having done so *end* Then we awaken him and 
ask him in the waking state to go out and get us a tube of toothpaste *end* He 
leaves the hotel and wanders around the block in search of that tube *end* 
Finally he returns apologizing for his delay saying that it was necessary 
for him to go entirely around the block before he noticed a drugstore in the 
very building itself *end* This he says was very stupid of him but apparently 
men are made that way *end* Did he notice anything of interest as he made his 
walk *end* "Nothing *end* Oh yes there was a dog fight down at the corner." And 
he described the battle in detail *end* 

We now hypnotize him *end* He knows what we are seeking and at once 
proceeds to give us numbers and states of strange cars very pleased with 
the fact that he can recall thirteen *end* He evidently enjoys the game 
immensely and is quite proud of his memory *end* 

Then we awaken him and see what he knows in the conscious state *end* "How 
many cars are there around the building?" "I don’t know." "What are the 
numbers of the out-of-state licenses around the building?" "Good heavens 
I have no idea *end* I think there is a California car near the front entrance but I 
have no idea as to its number." A friend tries his hand *end* "Now look here *end* 
You were hypnotized half an hour ago and you left this room under 
posthypnotic suggestion." The subject gets irritated *end* "Look here yourself *end* 
I’m getting tired of that silly joke *end* This is the third time today you’ve 
pulled it *end* All right *end* I was hypnotized and saw pink elephants all over the 
lobby *end* Have it your way." And the subject sits down to a magazine 
obviously angry that this man cannot find something more amusing to say *end* 

Often the hypnotic subject will react in this manner *end* Push him just a little 
too far and he becomes irritated obviously a trick of the unconscious to 
end the argument and avoid any danger of being found out... *end* 

The reader’s very natural reaction is "Why all this rigmarole?".. *end* There are 
certain safeguards if we use hypnotism *end* First there is no danger of the 
agent’s selling out *end* More important would be the conviction of innocence 
which the man himself had and this is a great aid in many situations *end* He 
would never "act guilty" and if ever accused of seeking information would 

be quite honestly indignant *end* This conviction of innocence on the part of a 
criminal is perhaps his greatest safeguard under questioning by the 
authorities *end* Finally it would be impossible to "third degree" him and so 
pick up the links of a chain *end* This is very important for the most hardened 
culprit is always liable to "talk" if the questioners are ruthless enough *end* 

The Super Spy

In the instance we are about to outline we may or may not be dealing with 
multiple personality... *end* The little experiment I have just cited could be 
successful with any good somnambulist and would require about ten hours 
preparation *end* The example I now cite would work only with a certain 
number of the very best somnambulists and instead of ten hours 
preparation we had better allow ten months... *end* 
Perhaps we had better start by defending our position *end* Is it unethical *end* 
Perhaps but science merely states the facts... *end* Now let us return to our 
presentation *end* 

We start with an excellent subject and he must be just that one of those 
rare individuals who accepts and who carries through every suggestion 
without hesitation *end* In addition we need a man or a woman who is highly 
intelligent and physically tough *end* Then we start to develop a case of 
multiple personality through the use of hypnotism *end* 

In his normal waking state which we will call Personality A or PA this 
individual will become a rapid communist *end* He will join the party follow 
the party line and make himself as objectionable as possible to the 
authorities *end* Note that he will be acting in good faith *end* He is a communist or 
rather his PA is a communist and will behave as such *end* 

Then we develop Personality B PB the secondary personality the 
unconscious personality if you wish although this is somewhat of a 
contradiction in terms *end* This personality is rabidly American and anti-
communist *end* It has all the information possessed by PA the normal 
personality whereas PA does not have this advantage... *end* 

The proper training of a person for this role would be long and tedious but 
once he was trained you would have a super spy compared to which any 
creation in a mystery story is just plain weak *end* This is what the Illuminati 
have done *end* They create good Christian fronts with Illuminati dark alters 
who can see what the Christians are doing *end* My super spy plays his role as 
a communist in his waking state aggressively consistently fearlessly *end* But 
his PB is a loyal American and PB has all the memories of PA *end* As a loyal 
American he will not hesitate to divulge those memories and needless to 
say we will make sure he has the opportunity to do so when occasion 
demands *end* 

Here is how this technique would work ... *end* skipping this story and several 
others we come to We choose a good subject and then let him in on the 
plot *end* We disclose to him that he is an excellent hypnotic subject and we 
wish to use him for counterespionage *end* We suspect that in the near future 
someone is going to try hypnosis on him *end* He is to bluff to co-operate to 
the very best of his ability fake every test that is made and stay wide 
awake all the time *end* The test we fear most is that of an analgesia--
insensitivity to pain *end* So we coach him carefully with posthypnotic 
suggestions to the effect that even when wide awake and bluffing he will 
be able to meet every test which may be made here be it with ammonia 
under the nose a needle or worst of all the use of electricity which can 
be made extremely painful and is easy to use *end* 

Under these circumstances it will be virtually impossible to tell whether 
this man is bluffing or really in trance *end* The story continues that the master 
hypnotist thinks he has got a good subject and has hypnotized him deep *end* 
Then the subject tells him that he was only bluffing *end* The whole affair 
provides a nightmare for any counterintelligence group using hypnotism *end* 
They can be totally bluffed unless they turn to high tech equipment to see 
what is really happening *end* 
Estabrooks also explains how a man can be hypnotized and told he is only 
testing the preparedness of security *end* He is told he has a fake bomb but is 
really given a real bomb *end* The subject is sent to a location and blows up 
with the real bomb *end* The subject blows up with the bomb so the evidence of 
the hypnotic lie is lost *end* 
Hypnosis changes the threshold of the how the senses perceive *end* Sensitivity

What child can tell fool’s gold from real gold *end* The bottom line is that

C *end* Hypnosis Can Boost The Creativity of the Victim to Adopt Scripts

Creativity is a function of attentiveness playfulness anxiety limitations 
relaxation the trance state responsiveness and absorption *end* A good 
programmer can assist or boost the creativity of the child *end* The programmer 
can tell stories and programming scripts in a vivid way so that the sensory 
pictures are bold and strong *end* The child can taste and feel and touch in their 
minds the script being given them *end* Besides the language of the 
programmer other aids such as fear and drugs can enhance a victim’s 
attentiveness *end* Playfulness comes naturally to children *end* They naturally 
pretend and use fantasy in their play *end* Because children are innately 
creative they are far easier to program *end* 

Researchers have also discovered that creativity needs an element of 
anxiety and chaos in the person’s life *end* If everything is orderly and in 
perfect harmony the creative juices will not flow *end* The conscious mind and 
the subconscious mind need to grapple *end* For creativity to be productive it 
must occur within limits *end* For instance the concerto is created within the 
limits of a piano keyboard *end* 

The programmer and the Grande Dame and the Grande Mother of the 
Illuminati victim carefully guide the child’s creativity and set limits *end* The 
spark of creativity occurs when there is an alternation of intense 
concentration and relaxation *end* The programmers must work back and forth 
between torture and kindness *end* 

A light trance will allow the mind to surface -creative ideas *end* That is why 
writers and composers get ideas when they are in a light trance driving in 
a light sleep or shaving or some other place where a light trance occurs *end* 
Receptivity is the willingness to accept a creative idea when it comes *end* The 
final part of creativity is one’s absorption into the process of creativity *end* 
The artist may get so immersed into the portrait that he is painting that the 
portrait seems alive and real--the actual person *end* This immersion where 
things imagined become real is important to keep the creative juices 
flowing *end* 

The hypnotist/programmer can enhance the creative process by giving the 

child positive encouragement to reduce their fears and inhibitions to 
creativity *end* The programmer could say to the older child a younger child 
might be told something else

"You take all of your fear of not being creative and put them 
into a sack *end* The sack now becomes a bundle of energy *end* Now 
imagine you are opening the sack and out of the sack comes a 
rainbow of energy *end* It is powerful it is positive *end* You are now 
full of new ideas *end* You can feel this power surge through your 
body *end* Your mind is now clear and focused focused you feel 
confident sure of your talent and eager to set your new ideas 
into motion and you control the energy in your life you are 
very successful in controlling the energy in your life...you take 
a few breaths and relax *end* You notice the neighborhood around 
you there is a beautiful park you begin to notice how 
beautiful the day is and you begin to feel a fresh new energy 
flowing through your body...the more calm you become the 
more enthusiastic and creative you become...you will feel free 
to create to enjoy your creative talent to invent to shape and 
form new and wonderful ideas." 

This is not to say that the Illuminati programmer or Mother of Darkness 
assistant will use this type of hypnotic suggestions but sometimes it does 
become necessary to teach some children how to dissociate and how to 
become creative *end* If they do not develop these abilities they may lose their 
life to the torture *end* 
The Vital Role of Movies for Hypnotizing Small Children

As mentioned before the hypnotist will find children easier to hypnotize if 
they know how to do it with small children *end* One method that is effective is 
to say to the small children "Imagine you are watching a favorite 
television show." This is why the Disney movies and the other shows are 
so important to the programmers *end* They are the perfect hypnotic tool to get 
the child’s mind to dissociate in the right direction *end* The programmers have 
been using movies since almost day one to help children learn the hypnotic 
scripts *end* 

For children they need to be part of the hypnotic process *end* If the hypnotist 
allows the child to make up his own imagery the hypnotic suggestions will 
be stronger *end* Rather than telling the child the color of a dog the 
programmer can ask the child *end* This is where the books and films shown 
the child assist in steering its mind in the right direction *end* If the hypnotist 
talks to a child he must take extra precaution not to change the tone of his 
voice and to have smooth transitions *end* Most of the Disney films are used for 
programming purposes *end* Some of them are specifically designed for mind-
control *end* 
Spinning Tops

One method for inducting children into a dissociative state is to have them 
look at a large spinning top as the colors whirl around *end* Carousel rides 
have also been popular to induce trances *end* 

A good sampling of optical illusions can be found in Katherine Joyce’s 
book Astounding Optical Illusions *end* NY Sterling Pub *end* Co *end*The 
illusion The Temple makes one feel they are in a passageway leading to a 
small door *end* The Escalator makes one feel they are going up and down and 
could be used for building in an internal elevator *end* 

We know that optical illusions have been 
used but we are not saying that these 
particular ones have been *end* For a programmer 
to use an optical illusion he would first 
submerge the victim into a drugged state with 
the appropriate mind altering music and 
sounds and then flash the illusion onto the 
wall that the victim was facing *end* With virtual 
reality the child can really be immersed into a 
weird head trip *end* 
 

The Hypnotic Voice of the Programmer

Programmers will adopt either an authoritarian voice which is 
commanding and direct or a permissive soft tone *end* Bear in mind the slave 
who has the authoritarian voice used on it sees the programmer as God 
with the authority of life or death over its his or her body and soul *end* The 
heightened expectation from the commanding tone will increase the 
suggestions chance for success *end* However a softer tone will relax the 
victim and the hypnotist and the programming victim become partners in 
the hypnotic process *end* The advantage of the softer tone is that the creativity 
of the victim is enhanced and participates more in the process *end* The 
hypnotic induction becomes more real when the victim participates more 
in the process *end* 

The Monarch programmer will either use a monotone voice or a rhythmic 
voice *end* Remember the professor who could lull his students to sleep *end* He 
had a hypnotic voice without knowing it *end* A singsong or rhythmic voice is 
comforting *end* It can also be used by the Programmer *end* One continuous thread 
of words strung together are used to close out distractions *end* 

After a suggestion or command is given a pause is made by the 
programmer in talking so that the suggestion is taken into the mind *end* 
Otherwise anxiety is experienced by the victim’s mind and the suggestion 
will not be accepted as well *end* Cisco the co-author provides an example of 
how a hypnotic script can go with music 

"Close your eyes for your eyes will only tell the truth *end* And the 
truth isn’t what you want to see *end* In the dark it is easy to 
pretend that the truth is what it ought to be *end* "Softly deftly 
music shall caress you *end* Hear it feel it secretly possess you *end* 
Open up your mind let your fantasies unwind in this darkness 
which you know you cannot fight *end* The darkness of the music 
of the night *end* "Close your eyes start a journey through a 
strange new world *end* Leave all thoughts of the world you knew 
before *end* Close your eyes and let music set you free *end* Only then 
can you belong to me *end* "Floating falling sweet intoxication *end* 
Touch me trust me savor each sensation *end* Let the dream 
begin let your darker side give in to the power of the music I 
write *end* You alone can make my song take flight *end* Help me make 

the music of the night *end* "Helpless to resist the notes I write For 
I compose the music of the night *end* Hearing is believing music 
is deceiving *end* Hot as lightening soft as candle light *end* Dare you 
trust the music of the night?"
