Detailed Description of the Preferred Embodiment

This invention is based upon observations at the physical mechanism the 
mammalian brain uses to perceive acoustic vibrations *end* This observation is 
based in part upon neuro anatomical and other experimental evidence 
which relates to microwave brain stimulation and the perception of sounds *end* 
It is has been observed that monochromatic acoustic stimuli acoustic 
tones or single tones of different frequencies uniquely stimulate different 
regions at the cochlea *end* 

It has also been observed that there is a corresponding one to one 
relationship between the frequency of a monochromatic acoustic stimulus 
and the region of the auditory cortex neurally stimulated by the cochlcar 
nerve under the physiologically normal conditions tonotopicity *end* 

It has been observed that for an acoustic tone of a frequency which is at the 
lower end at the entire acoustical range perceivable by a person that thin 
lateral region "Line" parallel to the medial axis of the brain and toward 
the infenor portion of the primary auditory cortex is stimulated *end* For an 
acoustic tone whose frequency is toward the high end of the entire 
perceivable acoustic range a thin lateral region parallel to the medial axis 
and toward the superior portion at the primary auditory cortex is 
stimulated *end* Neural stimulation results in the generation at a broad band of 
microwave photons by the change in rotational energy state of protons 
integral to the neuron membrane of the auditory cortex *end* 

The physical size and shape of the brain/skull cavity together with the 
semiconductor properties conductivity and dielectric constant of the 
brain tissue provide an electromagnetic resonant cavity *end* Specific single 
frequencies are constructively reinforced so that a number of standing 
electromagnetic waves each at its own single electromagnetic frequency 
in the microwave frequency region *end* are generated in the brain *end* Each such 
standing electromagnetic wave is called a characteristic mode of the brain/

skull cavity *end* Analysis in terms of prolate spheroidal wave functions 
indicates that transverse electric field components of these modes have 
maxima in the region of the auditory cortex *end* 

This analysis further shows that transverse electric field possess a variation 
of amplitude with angle in the angular plane along the vertical dimension 
of the auditory cortex and that is dependent only upon the primary mode 
number *end* The auditory cortex in the normally functioning mammalian brain 
is a source of microwave modes *end* The auditory cortex generates these 
modes in accordance with the neural stimulation of the auditory cortex by 
the cochlear nerve *end* Mode weighting for any one acoustic tone stimulus is 
given by the amplitude of each mode along the line region of the auditory 
cortex which is neurally stimulated by that acoustic tone stimulus *end* 

A listing of mode weighting versus frequency of acoustic stimulus is called 
the mode matrix *end* In this invention the functions of the ear the cochlear 
nerve and the auditory cortex are simulated *end* Microwaves simulating the 
mode matrix are inserted directly into the region of the auditory cortex *end* By 
this insertion of simulated microwave modes the normal operation of the 
entire natural hearing mechanism is simulated *end* 

Referring now to FIG *end*  and FIG *end*  there is shown an apparatus which 
provides for induced perception of sound into a mammalian brain *end* This 
bearing device includes a microphone  which receives sounds an 
acoustic filter bank  which separates the signals from the microphone 
into component frequencies and a mode control matrix  which generates 
the mode signals which are used to control the intensity of microwave 
radiations which are injected into the skull cavity in the region of the 
auditory cortex *end* The acoustic filter bank  consists of a bank of acoustic 
filters Fl through Fk which span the audible acoustic spectrum *end* These 
filters may be built from standard resistance inductance and capacitance 
components in accordance with well established practice *end* 
In the preferred embodiment there are  filters which  correspond to 
the observed critical bandwidths of the human ear *end* In this preferred 
embodiment a typical list at filter parameters is given by Table I below

The rectifier outputs one 
through K are feed to K 
mode partition devices *end* 
The mode partitioning 
devices each have N 
outputs wherein N is the 
number of microwave 
oscillators used to generate 
the microwave radiation *end* 
The outputs  through N of 
each mode partition device 
is applied respectively to 
the inputs of each gain 
controlled amplifier of the 
microwave radiation 
generator *end* The function of 
the mode control matrix  
is the control of the microwave amplifiers in the microwave amplifier bank 
 *end* In the preferred embodiment thus will be  outputs and  microwave 
frequency oscillators *end* 
Connected to each microwave amplifier gain control line is a mode 
simulation device  which receives weighted mode signals from the mode 
partition devices  *end* Each mode simulation device consists of one through lines and diodes  which are each connected to summing junction  *end* 
The diodes  provide for isolation from one mode partition device to the 
next *end* The diodes  prevent signals from one mode partition device from 
returning to the other mode partition devices which are also connected to 
the same summing junction of the mode summation device  *end* The diodes 
also serve a second function which is the rectification of the signals 
received from the acoustic filter bank by way of the mode partition 
devices *end* In this way each mode partition device output is rectified to 
produce a varying DC voltage with major frequency components of the 
order of  milliseconds or less *end* The voltage at the summation junction  
is thus a slowly varying DC voltage *end* 

The example mode partition devices are shown in greater detail in FIG *end*  

FIG *end*  and FIG *end*The mode partition devices are merely resistance 
networks which produce  through N output voltages which are 
predetermined divisions of the input original from the acoustic filter 
associated with the mode partition device *end* 

FIG *end*  shows a mode partitioning device wherein several outputs are 
associated with each series resistor  *end* 

In the embodiment depicted in FIG *end*  there is an output associated with 
each series resistor only and thus there are N series resistors or the same 
number of series resistors as there are outputs *end* The values of the resistors 
in the mode partition resistor network are determined in accordance with 
the magnitudes of the frequency component from the acoustic filter bank 
 which is required at the summation point  or the gain control line for 
amplifiers  *end* The microwave amplifier bank  Consists of plurality of 
microwave oscillators  through N each of which is connected to an 
amplifier  *end* Since the amplifiers  are gain controlled by the signals at 
summation junction  *end* the magnitude of the microwave output is 
controlled by the mode control matrix outputs Fl through F *end* In the 
preferred embodiment there are  amplifiers *end* The leads from the 
microwave oscillators I through N to the amplifiers  are shielded to 
prevent cross talk from one oscillator to the next and to prevent stray 
signals from reaching the user of the hearing device *end* The output 
impedance of amplifiers  should be  ohms and this is indicated by 
resistor  *end* The outputs of amplifiers  are all connected to a summing 
junction  *end* The summing junction  is connected to a summing 
impedance  which is approximately  ohms *end* The relatively high 
amplifier output impedance  as compared to the relatively low summing 
impedance  provides minimization of cross talk between the amplifiers *end* 
Since the amplitude of the microwave signal needed at the antenna  is 
relatively small there is no need to match the antenna and summing 
junction impedances to the amplifier  output impedances *end* Efficiency of 
the amplifiers  is not critical *end* Level control of the signal at antenna  is 
controlled by pick off  which is connected to the summing impedance 
 *end* 

In this manner the signal at antenna  can be varied from  ground to a 

value which is acceptable to the individual *end* The antenna  is placed next 
to the subject’s head and in the region of the subjects auditory cortex  *end* 
By placement of the antenna  in the region of the auditory cortex  *end* the 
microwave field which is generated simulates the microwave field which 
would be generated if the acoustic sounds were perceived with normal 
hearing and the auditory cortex was functioning normally *end* 
In FIG *end* A there is shown a second embodiment of the microwave 
radiation and generator portion of the hearing device *end* In this embodiment a 
broad band microwave source  generates microwave signals which are 
feed to filters  through  which select from the broad band radiation 
particular frequencies to be transmitted to the person *end* As in FIG *end*  the 
amplifiers  receive signals on lines  from the mode control matrix *end* 
The signals on lines  provide the gain control for amplifiers  *end*

In Fig *end*  there is shown a modified microwave generator which may be 
used to determine a subject's microwave mode frequencies *end* In this device 
the acoustic filter bank and the mode control matrix have been removed 
and replaced by voltage level signals generated by potentiometers  *end* Also 
included ar a plurality of variable frequency oscillators  which feed 
microwave amplifiers  which are gain controlled from the signal 
generated by potentiometers  and pick off arm  *end* 

This modified microwave hearing generator is used to provide signals 
using one oscillator at a timi *end* When an oscillator is turned on *end* the 
frequency is varried about the estimated value until a maximum acoustic 
perception by the subject is perceived *end* This perception however may 
consist of a buzzing or hissing sound tat rather than a tone because only 
one microwave frequencies being received *end* The first test of perception is 
to determine the subject’s lowest modal frequency for audibility *end* M=  *end* 
Once this modal frequency is obtained *end* The process is repeated for several 
higher modal frequencies and continued until no maximum acoustic 
perception occurs *end* 

Another method of determination of a subject’s modal frequencies is 
through anatomical estimation *end* This procedure is by measurement of the 
subject’s cephalic index and the lateral dimensions of the skull *end* In this 
method the shape is determined in prolate spheroidal coordinance *end* Purely 
anatomical estimation of sub ject’s modal frequencies is performed by first 
measuring the maximum lateral dimension breadth L FIG *end*  of the 
subject’s head together with the maximum dimension D anterior to 
Posterior in the medial plane of the subject’s head *end* D is the distance along 
Z axis as shown in FIG *end*

The ratio L/D called in anthropology the cephalic index is monotonically 
related to the boundary value E defining the ellipsoidal surface 
approximating the interface between the brain and the skull in the prolate 
spheroidal coordinate system *end* E defines the shape of this interface; E 
and D together give an estimate of a the semi-focal distance of the 
defining ellipsoid *end* Using E and a together with known values of the 
conductivity and di-electric constants of brain tissue those wavelengths 
are found for which the radial component of the electric field satisfies the 

boundary condition that it is zero at E *end* 

These wavelengths are the wavelenghts associated wi ith the standing 
waves or modes *end* The corresponding frequencies are found by dividing the 
phase velocity of microwaves in brain tissue by each of the wavelengths A 
subject’s microwave modal frequencies may also be determined by 
observing the effect of external microwave radiation upon the EEG *end* The 
frequency of the M equal I mode may then be used as a base point to 
estimate all other modal frequencies *end* 

A typical example of such an estimation is where the subject is laterally 
irradiated with a monochromatic microwave field simultaneous with EEG 
measurement and the microwave frequency altered until a significant 
change occurs in the EEG the lowest such frequency causing a significant 
EEG change is found *end* This is iden-tified as the frequency of the M=  
mode the lowest mode of importance in auditory perception *end* The purely 
anatomical estimation procedure FIGS *end*    is then performed and the 
ratio of each modal frequency to the M  modal frequency obtained *end* These 
ratios together with the experimentally-determined M - I frequency are 
then used to estimate the frequencies of the mode numbers higher than  *end*

lateral plane containing theandcoordinates of FIG *end*the prolate 
spheroidal coordinate variable  angle lies FIGS *end*  and  *end* Plots of the 
transverse electric field amplitude versus primary mode numberare

The apparatus of FIG *end*  may also be used to determine values for a hearing 
device which are required for a particular subject *end* Once the modal 
frequencies have been estimated the device of FIG *end*  which includes 
variable microwave oscillators may be used to determine values for the 
oscillators which match the subject and to determine resistance values 
associated with the mode partition devices of the mode control matrix *end* In 
FIG *end*  manual control of the amplifier gain is achieved by potentiometers 

 *end* In this manner the amplifier gains are varied about the estimated 
settings ror an acoustic tone stimulus in the region of two thousand Hertz 
 khz until maximum acoustic perception and a purest tone are achieved 
together *end* The term purest tone may also be described as the most pleasing 
acoustic perception by the subject *end* 

This process may be repeated at selected .frequencies above and below  
kHz *end* The selected frequencies correspond to regions of other acoustic filter 
center frequencies of the subject *end* When modal frequency oscillator 
frequency and gain set values setting a potentiometer  are noted it is 
then possible to calculate fixed oscillator frequencies and control resistor 
values for the adjusted hearing device for this particular subject *end* In the 
event the subject has no prior acoustic experience that is deaf from birth 
estimated resistor values must be used *end* Also a complex acoustic 
stimulation test including language articulation and pairs of harmonically 
related tones may be developed to maximize the match of the hearing 
device parameters for those of this particular subject *end* 

Typical components for use in this invention include commercially 
available high fidelity microphones which have a range of  Hz to  kHz 
with plus or minus  dB variation *end* The audio filters to be used with the 
acoustic filter bank  are constructed in a conventional manner and have 
Q values of about  *end* The filters may also be designed with  dB down 
points ½ the bandwidth away from the center frequency occurring at 
adjacent center frequency locations *end* The diodes  in the mode control 
matrix which provide isolation between the mode partition circuits are 
commercially available diodes in the audio range *end* The microwave 
oscillators I through N and the microwave amplifiers  are constructed 
with available microwave transistors which can be configured either as 
oscillators or amplifiers *end* Examples of the transistors are GaAsFET field 
effect transistors by Hewlitt Packard known as the HFET series or silicone 
bipolar transistors by Hewlitt Packard known as the HXTR series *end* All the 
cable between the oscillators the microwave amplifiers and the antenna 
should be constructed with either single or double shielded coaxial cable *end* 
The antenna  for directing microwave signals to the audio cortex  
should be approximately the size of the auditory cortex *end* A typical size 
would be one and one half CM high and one half to one CM wide *end* The 

antenna as shown is located over the left auditory cortex *end* but the right may 
also be used *end* Since the characteristic impedance of the brain tissue at these 
microwave frequencies is close to  ohms efficient transmission by 
commercially available standard  ohm coax is possible *end* The invention

slave and get thousands of pieces 
fragments of the mind alter 
personalities if these were not structured *end* 
Very few Multiples have ever really 
gotten to see the deeper parts of their 
Systems *end* Many of the early successes of 
therapists were actually only the 
integration of the fronts of Systems while 
the deeper cult parts were left fully 
functioning *end* 

The integration of the front alters was 
only a ruse to allow the therapist to think 
the patient was healed *end* The Illuminati’s 
organization whose identity still remains secret to the therapist can 
continue to use the ‘healed" patient *end* Everyone was happy therapist client 
and the abusers *end* 

Also I might add the book publishers such as those who published Sybil 
are also happy *end* Sybil is an occult first name--but the book movie and 
therapist give no hint that ritual abuse might be involved in her system’s 
MPD DID *end* The victim of When Rabbit Howls a book & a movie shows 
clear signs of having a full-blown highly structured and programmed MPD 
DID system but the movie doesn’t even hint of programming or Satanic 
involvement *end* The whole movie was a big slide *end* 

The Illuminati know the details and minutiae of every new direction the 
therapeutic community decides to take *end* Indeed a number of their people 
are leading the pack providing leads and misleads *end* Their first goal is to 

keep therapists on sideroads away from the real issues *end* The second goal is 
if they do get onto something to bring the slaves in and structure in 
defenses so that the therapists don’t go anywhere *end* And then when one has 
success like we have seen they eliminate front structures and front alters 
and turn to massive reprogramming and skillfully linking primal traumas 
with the new programs *end* 
Bear in mind the internal programming alters are also always alert and 
will restructure the system constantly if alters work against their 
programming *end* Restructuring is a process that can continually go on not 
something completed when the victim was a child *end* For instance new 
levels of alters can and are created when the victim is in their s either 
by the internal or external programmers *end* From observations it is clear that 
the most drastic changes are from the external programmers who can 
work much faster than the internal programmers *end* 

In the beginning the programmer must bring order out of the chaos he has 
created *end* He must use some type of structure to place worlds *end* In recent 
years these have been solar systems galaxies and planets because they 
have gone to Star Trek Star Wars Alien types of programming *end* Each 
planet may have a type of alter--a family if you will of alters who are 
similar *end* They will not be able to travel to other solar systems or stars or 
galaxies without transportation *end* Spaceships and teleporters have now 
replaced the elevator that the older systems used to go up and down the 
worlds *end* 

When the programming begins it must be simple enough that a child can 
understand it *end* One game that was excellent to teach internal structures to 
child victims was Chinese checkers *end* An innocent game but a great vehicle 
to communicate placement of alters and structures *end* Alter patterns would be 
placed upon the hexagram board with marbles *end* A marble would represent 
an alter *end* Notice that alter colors and/or jobs can be coded by what marble 
is chosen *end* A ruby alter can be a red marble *end* A blue coded alter is a blue 
marble *end* Structures which are to be superimposed upon each other in the 
child’s mind are easy to superimpose *end* Take one pattern - of marbles off 
and place the superimposed pattern of marbles over the same place *end* This is 
how several different structures can be tied together in one locality in the 

mind *end* This is one way structures can be layered in *end* The Hexagram checker 
board was called "The House of David" in one victim *end* 
B *end* The Creation of Roles Internal External Dependence etc *end* 
Many splits in the mind are not developed into full blown personalities *end* 
Some are simply fragments which are given a single job assignment *end* 
Generally a System will have about half a dozen alters which frequently 
take the body and hundreds of alters which only occasionally take the 
body *end* Internally the System must carry out the following functions 
Protect all information and history that relates to the creation and use of 
the slave *end* All the structuring and codes of the System are also secrets and 
need to be guarded *end* The programming and the very things that the slave 
can think about need to be guarded *end* The slave is meant to be entirely self-
governing *end* 

The best boss is the boss who gives a directive and can go do something 
else while the person receiving the order carries it out without input and 
supervision *end* The Monarch slave is the prime example of how to delegate 
authority *end* The delegation of authority allows both the master and the 
victim himself to blame the victim for the orders they carry out *end* 
The satanic cults will hide their alters which make money for the cult 
behind the blood and gore alters *end* This protects their illegal money making 
operations *end* Alters must learn to function as designed by the Programmer *end* 
If they can’t work together the Illuminati will try to get them to work 
together somewhat akin to a mechanic fixing a car *end* If the alters can’t be 
fixed they and their System will have to be thrown away *end* The dramatic 
disparities of all the alters goes hand in hand with what at first seems 
apparent then not apparent and then apparent again--there is a unity 
beneath the multiplicity *end* Alter functions and abilities overlap with other 
alters *end* No alter is entirely separate from several common pools of intellect 
and dispositions that are attributable to the entire alter system *end* 

Alters are real and separate persons *end* But the common traits that run 
through an alter system are also real *end* One alter system may have a streak 
of kindness and gentleness that runs through the entire system *end* There may 

be a few alters which have been battered enough not to display the trait 
but the trait is so pervasive that it characterizes the System *end* The 
programmers are also skilled at building in alters who can serve as 
balancing points *end* Unless the system of alters has balancing point alters 
who are calm cheerful and emotionally stable a system could easily self-
destruct with all the shatteredness pain and craziness that has been 
intentionally built into the system *end* 

Each level or world will have a balancing point *end* When the System is being 
charted during the early programming process a Mother of Darkness and 
the Programmer and the Grande Dame will make a decision on how to 
label the chart *end* By the time the child is four the weaknesses and strengths 
that characterize the alter System have been recorded on charts and the 
child’s destiny in life determined *end* The chart will read what occupation the 
child will be made into and what its function for the overall Illuminati 
plan will be *end* This determines what types of programs and alters must be 
created *end* 

Most people are still unfamiliar with multiplicity and their rigid thinking is 
challenged by the concept that one mind can have several personalities *end* On 
the other hand they can understand perfectly that a computer can wall off 
sections of memory and they can understand perfectly that a single human 
mind is superior to all the computers in the world assembled together and 
yet they can’t let go of their basic simplistic foundational understanding of 
life that one mind has only one personality *end* They will allow a computer 
this ability but not the human mind *end* 

The creation of multiple personalities also divides responsibility within a 
person *end* A person who lives with a multiple say for instance their handler 
will form widely divergent relationships with the different alters *end* In terms 
of programming each dissociated fragment of the mind may be molded 
into something *end* Some fragments lend themselves to be molded into full 
personalities and some lend themselves into being molded into single-
purpose fragments and some must be discarded *end* A part of the mind can be 
developed into a full-blown independent personality with all the 
idiosyncracies that any other person has *end* 

Bear in mind that generally the Programmers consider color identification 
and the coded numbers to be more critical for identifying an alter than a 
name *end* A name humanizes the alter *end* Names are sometimes attached later if 
needed by a handler *end* Some handlers simply refer to their sexual alters by 
their generic name "kitten" *end* 

Others may have a specific cat name such as "Tabby" "Bast" "Hecat" 
"Adandara" or "the Lion of Judah" for an alter *end* Keep in mind if full blown 
personalities are created it happens for both the benefit of the victim AND 
the programmers *end* 

During the Monarch Programming an average System will have at least 
 alters but not all of these will be personalities designed to hold the 
body *end* For those who need to get a handle theologically on how to approach 
this it is suggested that they approach it as a city of persons *end* A city has 
both a unity and a multiplicity about it *end* It also must carry out certain basic 
functions if it is to survive *end* All cities have administrations and city 
planners and justice and police and garbage collectors and 
entertainment etc *end* The early Illuminati researchers soon accepted that their 
victim of multiple personalities is in essence a city of people and so they 
used that understanding to construct in the victim’s head using the 
victim’s creativity under torture and drugs to create all the structures and 
features that accompany a geological land *end* The map of the Land of Oz in 
the Wizard of Oz books was frequently used for the front parts of a System 
with some additions and subtractions *end* 

The engineering of the structures within an Illuminati Monarch slave 
looks like the original designs were done by engineering specialists--
perhaps even Boolean algebra was used to develop the original designs *end* 
However once working models of systems were proven to function 
without fail lesser skilled programmers & technocrats could help assemble 
a Monarch System of alters without fully understanding the engineering 
and all of  the demonology/magic behind it *end* Just like in a city some people 
have friends and know others and other people are strangers and enemies 
so it is with an Illuminati system of multiples *end* Some alters may be aware 
of each other and some may even hate each other *end* 

When building a system the Programmers take advantage of their 
knowledge of how multiplicity works *end* Two alters can have several 
possible relationships which are 

a *end* two-way amnesia where neither alter knows about the other’s existence *end* 
This is what the Programmers want for most alters *end* They don’t want 
multiples to even know they are multiples *end* b *end* one-way amnesia where A 
alter knows B alter but B doesn’t know A *end* This can be accomplished by 
setting in one-way mirrors *end* 

c *end* co-presence two alters can come on top of each other at the front of the 
mind and hold the body together *end* This produces some strange behavior for 
the multiple as different alters synthesize their thoughts *end* When a tough 
alter comes up behind a Christian alter the Christian alter may find 
himself letting loose of a cuss word without knowing where exactly it 
came from *end* When a child alter comes up behind an adult the adult may 
find itself talking like a child *end* 
d *end* co-conscious this is when two alters are aware of what each other is 
thinking *end*

walls every so often where all communication and visibility between alters 
is walled off *end* These No-talk walls are specifically built structures and not 
the result of normal amnesia *end* A  grid may have for instance  No-

other *end* One method of dividing the levels is the level of trance for level

turning lights on inside of their worlds *end*

finished result the time it shows but they don’t see all the mechanisms *end*

deadly only if one can’t deal with the demonology *end*

In order to use the multiple in different life styles--they divide up a system 
of alters into worlds of alters which rarely see each other *end* These worlds are 
also called cities *end* The words "city" or "world" are interchangeable when it 

comes to a Monarch System *end* Typically they received names such as 
Atlantis City of Refuge Shangri-la and Troy *end* 

Later after Candy Jones exposed the programming there was a major shift 
about this time and many of the Systems were programmed with Solar 
Systems *end* Each planet had a different group or race of alter or demon *end* The 
concept of Star Trek was helpful for this *end* Some of the Systems 
programmed in the s used Star Trek as their basis *end* The distribution of 
alters was similar to watching the various episodes of Star Trek *end* 

Alters that were created at the same time and left in an area of the System 
together are families *end* The programmers in their efforts to dehumanize 
these alters will stick to animal names such as referring to them as "litters" *end* 
The front level of a System would often be given a cover *end* The front level 
might see their world as a basketball court or several houses or a 
dollhouse or a street *end* The front world is set up to deceive anyone from 
discovering the true structure of the system *end* The programmers can link and 
unlink and move alters around *end* Eventually they get something neat and 
tidy on a sheet a paper *end* 

A standard Illuminati System is built like a xx cube with an 
elevator shaft running up and down from the bottom to the top *end* The 
elevator is constructed as a piece of DNA and alters can ride up and down 
the elevator go up or down in trance to move when allowed *end* Most of the 
alters have no sense of time and most of the alters do not hold the body 
very frequently *end* For various reasons most of the alters never grow up *end* 
Obviously if they don’t hold the body very much and are dissociated 
from everyone else’s memories they have nothing to stimulate them to 
grow up *end* However the Programmers must have some of the alters who can 
function as adults *end* For instance alters who go into bars must think of 
themselves as adults *end* The alters which will hold the body in public will be 
hypnotically made into adults *end* 

The Network likes to leave many child alters because most of them are 
pedophiles and they like the pseudo-pedophile experience of making it 
with an alter that thinks it is four years old *end* Or just the opposite sometimes 
an adult alter will appear within a child victim and this is a clue that this is 

an access/reporting alter *end* 
Many of the Illuminati systems especially Mengele’s were set up on a 
x grid of alters *end* The grids are numbered top to bottom and side to side 
but not in the fashion one might expect *end* The typical Mengele grid will 
begin with  and proceed              *end* However 
the structure doesn’t have to be a grid any geometric shape works and has 
been used such as a sphere cube or pyramid *end* 

Dr *end* Star and his wife who is an OTO programmer working out of Corpus 
Christi TX likes to structure an alter system in the shape of the Seal of 
Solomon *end* The Yin-yang symbol is then equated with the entire Seal of 
Solomon *end* The all-seeing eye is placed in the center of Star’s systems just 
like Mengele would put in an All-Seeing Eye *end* The hidden Sun of 
Tiphareth is placed into Dr *end* Star’s victim’s systems as well as the four 
elements and sulfuric acid *end* Alters are then placed in the various positions 
around the hexagram *end* 

Because therapists and Christian ministers are generally unaware of the 
deeper occult things they usually miss seeing the occult philosophies 
behind the structures *end* For instance the elements of earth wind fire and 
water are not just part of magic--they are in Druidism considered the four 
zones or directions also called rings which are held together by the fifth 
ring--balance *end* This is the basis of Celtic geometric art metaphysical maps 
and ancient Ireland was symbolically divided into four regions with a 
unifying fifth *end* This was the bardic view of the universe which is presented 
in the Vita Merlini written by Geoffrey of Monmouth in  *end* 
Supposedly England Wales and Scotland were also divided into  regions 
with a unifying fifth too *end* And all these four regions Ireland Wales 
Scotland and England are joined again in the U.K *end* 

In Druidism the four magical elements the Sword Rod Cup and Shield 
are unified by the Cord while the four elements are unified by the spirit *end* 
Ancient Druid stone statues of triple faced gods and goddesses still remain 
today *end* Heads were considered sacred by the early Celts which is why the 
heads of the top Grand Dames are preserved after they are ritually 
murdered *end* If an outsider really wants to understand why Illuminati systems 

are constructed in the fashion that they are--first understand that there is a 
great depth of meaning behind what structures are used to build an internal 
world *end* An ex-programmer talks about how the programmers would call 
upon Satan in high level rituals to "Tell me what to do and I’ll do what 
you want" to gain wisdom in how to design these alter systems *end* Within a 
System a few alters will be given maps to the System *end* There will be a 
structure "map" which takes the system down through its progressive 
levels down to its fundamental or primal level *end* There will also be internal 
world maps maze maps or what some call programming maps *end*

How the Self of a Man Alter Consists of Shattered Shadow Alters A 
Script Mirrors and Assigned Demons

What really is an alter *end* An alter is a dissociated part of the mind which is 
developed BY the programmers to be a complete personality *end* We will now 
explain what an alter is *end* If you were to look on the programmers’ charts found 
in his grey  ring binder or his lap top computer you would see graphs with 
alters with access codes *end* What are these alters *end* If the programmers didn’t 
invest a great deal of programming and structuring each alter would not be a 
complete personality *end* 

On the chart the programmer will have a square on a grid where he will 
record the cult name the front name the alter’s alpha-numeric pull up code 
and its grid number *end* What seems neat and tidy is really not so neat and tidy *end* 
That alter is really an alter with many shadows of itself *end* This is a family of 
fragments of that alter which hold parts of itself *end* 

There is a particular secret term that only the programmers use for these 
fragments but for purposes of discussion we will call these fragments "family 
fragments" or "shadow fragments." For instance a Gatekeeper alter will have 
a shadow alter fragment that holds its fear one that holds its pain one that 
holds its anger and many that hold its memories of abuse and torture *end* What 
appears on the grid as a square is in reality a box holding lots of fragments *end* 
The programmers understand how multiplicity works so rather than chart an 
alter with  fragments coming off of it--they name the whole mess after the 
main alter they have created for that family of fragments *end* 

The main alter really is a fictional persona created by the programmers linked 
to numerous fragments of the mind *end* The mind of the child victim will 
cooperate with the torture and programming *end* The programmer will verbally 
discuss his programming scripts with his close assistants for instance the 
Grand Dame who helps him; but he doesn’t record the scripts down *end* 

Historically the Programmers have always individually tailored their story 
scripts for each child *end* Because the best are master story tellers who can make 
a story come alive they do not need to depend upon stale written scripts *end* The 
Wizard of Oz and Mother Goose books etc *end* are read prior to actual 

programming session to enhance the programming session *end* The final alters 
are recorded but not the stories or the lies told them *end* 

After a main alter has been created and shattered the programmers find this 
main alter within the mind and give it a personal history via films virtual 
reality headsets stories etc *end* give it a job within the system a place to live in 
the internal world and its rules and guide lines on how to function within the 
system *end* It will be given scripts about the outside world *end* And shortly we will 
explain those *end* This doesn’t mean that alters don’t exist--they are physically 
part of the mental makeup of a multiple’s brain--but an alter’s existence is not 
at all what it sees or what outsiders see *end* Both the alter and the therapist see 
only a small part of the picture *end* 

John O *end* Bearhrs Limits of scientific psychiatry Role of uncertainly in mental 
health *end* NY Brunner/Mazel  pp *end* - *end* who did therapeutic work 
with Multiples recognized some of the process that we are describing *end* He 
wrote about how an alter when confronted with more pain guilt and rage will 
dissociate this mental hazardous waste into alters who function as internal 
garbage cans *end* He described a victim who had a jolly front alter Diane with a 
winning smile *end* This front alter dumped her pain on a small child alter Mary 
who lived in an internal "basement" *end* However in one particular case Mary 
didn’t want the pain and she passed it to Karl a  yr *end* old alter who cried and 
yelled so loud internally that Danny a  year old alter who was characterized 
by toughness and courage took the pain *end* However the actual situation is more 
subtle and complex than Beahrs realized *end* Every alter creates shadow alters of 
itself to handle the anger fear guilt betrayal etc *end* The Programmers are totally 
aware of these shadow alters and they work with them *end* 
If we picture an alter as a point in the mind--a dot or small circle then we can 
for the sake of discussion picture the shadow splits off of that alter as rays 
coming out of that small circle *end* Now we have an image of something looking 
like a sun with rays *end* Actually in real life after all the torture the shadow 
alters holding memories and all the programs attached are simply one big 
mess that resembles the branches of a tree with leaves *end* 

The Programmers have made a thorough mess of the person’s mind--and they 
need some clean way to deal with this mess they have created *end* So the 

Programmers use the imagery that best resembles the mess they have made *end* 
The victim is told they have a tree with branches and leaves growing through 
them *end* This tree with its branches grows through out every alter *end* The image of 
the vine and its branches is also used because then the programmers can bring 
in the Bible to make their programming seem to be supported by God’s Holy 
Word *end* The original alter is told that it is a mote of nothingness a very tiny 
circle *end* 

The programmers don’t chart all the family or shadow fragments of an alter 
because they understand MPD DID *end* The fragments will hold all the 
memories of abuse so the alter can function *end* The fragments will also give the 
alter the appearance of the full range of emotions *end* If a main alter gets angry or 
feels guilty what is happening is that it has accessed its shadows to express 
the full range of emotions *end* 

The Programmers abuse an alter and get the Shadow alters *end* Then they 
hypnotically attach a memory cue which is a code consisting of the alter’s 
name the date of the memory and perhaps something else to complete the 
code to the main alter so that they can access the memory anytime they want *end* 
Then they hypnotically & demonically build an one-way mirror between this 
main alter and the shadow alters they have just created *end* These one-way 
mirrors are like one way windows--the reason they are referred to as mirrors 
is that they are put in the child’s mind via mirrors *end* 

Next they ritually/magickly implant demons to guard the mirrors and to 
guard each memory held by the shadow alters *end* This separates an alter from 
knowing itself and its own abuse *end* The main alter has dissociated the pain etc *end* 
to its shadow alters of itself *end* The Programmers then use the memory as 
blackmail to keep the main alter in line *end* The main alter has dissociated the 
pain but will recover the memory if either one of three possibilities happen a *end* 
the Programmer or handler says the memory code x or b *end* if an event 
happens that triggers the main alter to remember c *end* the main alter tries to 
remember the abuse and the programming and in doing so they will be 
stepping outside of the circle assigned to them and will "break the circle & 
break the mirrors." 

Remember how we described a Main alter as a small circle with the rays 

shadow alters split off from it *end* The shadow or family alters of a Main alter 
are the true history of an alter *end* The Main alter is given the script to totally love 
the Programmer/Master *end* It should be angry at what has happened to it *end* The 
ability to direct that anger is lost with the dissociation but might be retrieved 
if the alter remembered so the programmers transfer it by creating some 
outside person or object for the alter to focus their hate upon *end* 

Elaborate hate scripts are then given to the main alter *end* The love of the Master 
now protects the Main alter from having to remember its pain *end* Very few alters 
and very few non-multiple people would want to remember such trauma and it 
is very unpopular in society to remember past traumas how often have you 
heard expressions "let bygones be bygones" "the past is past" "don’t dig up 
old skeletons" etc *end* As long as the alter loves its Master it is somewhat safe 
from remembering its own traumas *end* And yet for a Monarch slave to regain its 
own mind the alters must regain their own memories *end* That is why to really 
break down the programming memory work is need *end* That Monarch slaves 
must regain their memories to heal is a hard one for many people and 
ministers to understand *end* 

Most deliverance ministries pray that God would take away their bad 
memories *end* Further the programming holds the lies in place and the 
demonology holds the traumas programs and memories in place *end* A Main 
alter is really in the middle of special purpose Shadow alters which have been 
split from itself *end* 

The Programmers do a reversal on this and tell the Main alter that it is on the 
outside looking in *end* Vagabond Programming which tells an alter it is a 
vagabond is then applied to teach the alter it doesn’t belong to the inside 
world nor to the outside world *end* It belongs nowhere *end* The Main alter will 
perceive that it is on the outside looking in at mirrors *end* The mirrors then guard 
the inside of the circle *end* To try to remember the truth is to break the circle of 
mirrors *end* The circle of mirrors has magical significance because it ties in with 
the witchball or speculum which the witches have used over the centuries to 
see beyond time and space *end* The steps that the programmers do can be 
explained on many levels *end* Many of these steps are done for special occult 
reasons *end* 

One of the first things taught to a child is "DO NOT BREAK THE CIRCLE" *end* 
This has both the internal meaning "don’t go after you own memories and the 
external meaning "don’t leave the cult--the circle." 

Special black mats such as used in wrestling have been constructed by the 
Programmers *end* The first black mat is a circular mat with a ’ radius *end* The next 
black mat has an ’ radius with a donut hole with a ’ radius so that it can fit 
over/around the first circle *end* From there you have concentric donut shaped 
pieces of mat each four feet wider in radius than the previous which can all 
be joined together *end* Each of the concentric circles will have a different colored 
circle painted on its edge *end* The victim child while it is in the crawling stage 
will be placed onto the middle dot and told to stay *end* They will be punished 
every time they move *end* When they finally can do this obediently they will be 
given the ’ circle *end* Toys will be placed outside of the painted line which may 
for starters be a blue line then perhaps green and then red *end* Just off of the 
mat are interesting things like a full bottle a blanket a coat food toys etc *end* 
The child is cold hungry and bored *end* Will the child obey and stay in its circle *end* 
If it doesn’t it will be punished by being mildly shocked or having its head 
dunked into a toilet or its hand punished and it will be set back in the circle 
until it’s will is broken and it learns to submit to the order to stay in the circle *end* 

This teaches the victim child several things don’t step outside of boundaries 
don’t break the circle it teaches them the colors that will be used in the color 
programming of the internal world and it is again traumatizing *end* What they 
see hear and do will now be done in obedience *end*

The Presideo 

Various researchers who have tried to identify What happens when a normal 
non-multiple subject is hypnotized to not feel pain *end* Of course the subject 
consciously tells the hypnotist that he feels no pain but researchers such as 
the Watkins & Hilgards have demonstrated that the subject under hypnotism 
dissociates the pain to another part of the mind *end* In other words hypnosis and 
MPD DID which are both forms of dissociation are much closer in how they 
function than some people have realized *end* In fact some researchers who are 
well aware of how close the two dissociative functions are have defined MPD 
DID as "spontaneous hypnosis" Beahrs ; Bliss  *end* 

The non-conscious area of the mind that hypnotic subjects dissociated to have 
been labeled "ego-states" "the hidden observer" and "a covert cognitive 
structural system" *end* The giving away of pain fear and other traumas to 
Shadow parts is similar to what happens when researchers observe a person 
who is directed in hypnosis to not feel pain unknowingly giving his pain 
away to a hidden ego-state *end* A hiding place where alters can go a place of 
light which gives energy is created in a System *end* 

The New World Order’s One-World-Religion and their MindControl is 
organized on the hierarchal system with a S.P.I.N *end* front *end* The Illuminati and 

the occult world that they supervise has a strong hierarchial system both 
worldwide and within the slave *end* Fritz has spent a great deal of time 
researching and communicating to other how the hierarchy controls on a large 
scale and how it is miniaturized and how this identical hierarchy is placed 
internally into the slave *end* However the big cover for the hierarchial 
arrangement is the SPIN principal *end* 

What is the Spin Principle *end* 

S-P-I-N = Segmented Polycentric Integrated Networks *end* 

If one were to diagram a SPIN organizational chart it would not be a 
conventional box type configuration such as an army company organization 
chart *end* Rather it would resemble a fishnet with interlocking nodes with groups 
linked to many other groups and cluster around nodes *end* There is no center to 
the network *end* It is like the brain’s electrical connections with an overlap of 
functions so that good cells can take over from damaged sections *end* A network 
one of their buzzwords is many times more greater than the sum of its parts *end* 
The New Age author Marilyn Ferguson does an excellent job in describing 
how the Conspiracy’s SPIN network functions *end* 

"This is a source of power never before tapped in history 
multiple self-sufficient social movements linked for a whole array 
of goals whose accomplishment would transform every aspect of 
contemporary life *end* "

Because SPINs are so qualitatively different in organization and impact from 
bureaucracies...most people don’t see them--or think they are conspiracies *end* 
Often networks take similar action without conferring with each other simply 
because they share so many assumptions *end* It might also be said that the shared 
assumptions are the collusion *end* "The Aquarian Conspiracy is in effect a SPIN 
of SPINs a network of many networks aimed at social transformation *end* The 
Aquarian Conspiracy is indeed loose segmented evolutionary redundant *end* Its 
center is everywhere *end* Although many social movements and mutual-help 
groups are represented in its alliances its life does not hinge on any of them." 
Ferguson Marilyn *end* The Aquarian Conspiracy *end* Los Angeles CA J.P *end* Tarcher 
Inc *end*  p *end*---The next  pages are charts showing an hour glass & its 

turning mechanism & how a section can have various codes trance depths 
etc *end* 
   

 

The programmers enjoy setting up double-binds *end* One of their tricks is to 
create alters which are given negative spiritual roles with names to match *end* An 
alter may be named unforgiveness" or "the one who doesn’t trust anyone." 
For such an alter to trust someone makes the alter feel like it is giving up its 
name and therefore its identity *end* By combining the name with an identity that 
the alter doesn’t want to lose the programming intend to double bind the 
alter *end* The Satan alter within a System will see itself as Satan *end* The alter Satan 
feels that he is on the winning side in a war due to the lies that have been told 
this child alter when it was created *end* A girl child alter will be made to think 
they are the evil male Satan *end* The point is that the identity of this alter is tied 
up with their negative destructive role in the system *end* 

The Christian therapist has a better chance to show Satan that the Rule of the 
Victor means that Satan serves Almighty God than for a secular therapist to 
try to convince Satan that Satan doesn’t exist *end* And if the secular therapist tries 
to debunk the Biblical view of things what positive philosophy or spirituality 
is the secular therapist going to give this Satan alter to fight with against the 
inevitable external evil that we all face in life *end*

Next we will discuss how some of these types of alters are created *end* These 
will be discussed in alphabetical order *end* It should be pointed out that 
generally the Illuminati choose one of the early front Gatekeeper alters to 
be the alter who knows the entire system as it is made *end* This often is 
Gatekeeper no *end*After the entire structuring is finished this alter will be 
hypnotically programmed to forget that they know the entire system *end* By 
the age of ten an Illuminati system will have someone who knows the 
entire system *end* However these gatekeepers get heavy programming not to 
remember *end* 
Angry Alters

By the time the programmers are ready to create angry alters the child 
victim has been well conditioned not to get angry but to passively accept 
their abuse *end* The programmers have to get the child’s mind to break with 
their prior programming to get angry *end* In order to do this the child will be 
tormented without end for several days *end* This is one of the worst parts of 
the programming and many children die in this stage *end* The Illuminati pick 
their most gentle Mothers-of-Darkness systems to work with the male 
programmers *end* If the gentle Mothers-of-Darkness slaves didn’t bring some 
balance and affection to the child victims the sadistic programmers would 
probably kill all of the children at this stage of programming *end* For more on 
this see Egyptian Armies just a little further *end* 
Animal Alters Meant to act like animals

Although a large share of an alter system is dehumanized there are certain 
alters which will be created to actually hold the body and act like animals *end* 
The alter may even be named "animal." A male or female slave may have 
dog alters which bark like a dog and get into the correct position to allow a 
Rottweiler/German shepherd/Doberman to penetrate the slave sexually *end* 
This is accomplished by taking menstrual blood from a dog in heat and 
smearing it on the victim *end* 
Animal alters are created by the standard dehumanization methods and 
then shown films of what they are to become *end* Through hypnosis and 
behavior modification the alters eventually accept the role they are 
tortured and programmed into taking *end* It’s hard telling what roles the 
programmers have created it could possibly be any animal but cats dogs 
donkeys horses rats and mice are common examples *end* 
Christian Front Alters

Most Illuminati Systems have Christian front alters *end* Some of the early 
splits around  years of age are provided the chance to genuinely accept 
Christ *end* From these alters two things will be done *end* Front alters who are 
Christians will be created and satanic alters *end* In order to get dedicated 
Satanic alters Christian alters are severely traumatized and God is blamed 
for not helping them *end* The Satanic alters will be deeply convinced that God 
has abandoned them *end* The Christian alters will dissociate all the trauma 
and will believe that they are normal--nothing has happened out of the 
ordinary in their life *end* 

Christian alters will also like all MPD/DID alters tend to deal with 
overwhelming problems by dissociation *end* Many Christian alters will deny 
such basic things such as that a Satanic conspiracy exists *end* They often will 
be far more zealous than the normal Christian because they do not have 
conflicting ego-states *end* If any situation calls for compromise of their 
religious beliefs they can switch to someone else--and thereby escape 
having to compromise *end* 

There are many programmed multiples leading the Christian churches 
today *end* Christian alters are coached via the modern church and their 
handlers to only "spiritually minded" and not to challenge evil in the 
natural world *end* Some walk around believing that God will cure everything 
which is true but not in the sense that some of the churches are explaining *end* 
That doesn’t mean that all Systems will be "Pollyanish" but it can happen *end* 
The original Christian alters will be shamed and then hidden by the 
programmers *end* The "host" or "presenting" alter which holds the body will 
often be a Christian *end* This really helps hide the entire mind-control *end* 
Interestingly a system of  alters may have oniy less than a dozen 

Christians alters but the one or two strong Christian alters will exert a 
disproportionate influence on the System *end* 
The Illuminati has had a hard time controlling the Christian alters they 
allow *end* In their zeal to infiltrate control and destroy the Christian churches 
they have opened many of their top slaves up to the love of God which 
has ended in the slaves trying to break free *end* Unfortunately most ministers 
know too little to help these people escape *end* 
 Clones

The clones are little children who have been put into robot costumes and 
are trained to attack parts of the system which are not in compliance with 
the programming *end* The heads of the clones can be unscrewed *end* The clones 
can be taken out by various tactics--but there are hundreds of clones and 
they each have been numbered *end* The serial numbers are placed on them *end* An 
example of a clone’s number at the base of the neck might be . *end* This 
may either be a model or actual serial no *end* but often is tied to the birthdate 
of the victim which is generally part or all of the victim’s Monarch serial 
no *end* 
To create the clones during the s movie scenes of the divers of the 
Nautilus of the movie  Leagues Under the Sea were shown *end* With 
later models such as in Star Wars programming the robots of these shows 
suffice *end* Some clones kill with a knife as the divers in the movie  
Leagues Under the Sea *end* When clones surface and take the body they are 
cold *end* Programming is encased in a clone *end* 
Alters particularly cult alters may not be able to see the clones *end* They may 
be hidden in almost anything internally including door knobs and walls *end* 
However there is the possibility for the therapist that a net made of cloth 
woven of light can be dropped and the lumps will reveal the clones *end* They 
may be behind mirrors too *end* Water has certain properties that can stop 
clones as well as magnets *end* Microwaves will take care of the electronics *end* A 
little microwave can take out a group of clones *end* Clones have many shapes--
but they do not look like people *end* They usually have a switch to be 
activated *end* Atlantis may be set up as the world for clones in accord with 

 Leagues Under the Sea programming *end* Whatever the style robots & 
clones are popular items for programmers to install *end* 
One of the major defects of the first few decades of Illuminati 
programming was that the clones were set up so that water would stop 
them *end* Therapists could stop the clone armies by applying water on them *end* 
Recent models have corrected that deficiency *end* But when the clones are 
stopped and the diver suits are taken off of the child alters who are inside 
of the robot suits then a child alter will be found which is in the same 
drugged state that it was in when it was being programmed *end* This child 
fragment alter will often have an I.V *end* wires and needles in it and will be 
very druggy *end* It will be in its programmed war-like angry state *end* In 
Druidism a swan was something dirty like a pig in Judaism *end* Some alters 
which are assigned to protect are warned they will become swans *end* If the 
Queen of the Clones becomes a swan the clones will become helpless *end* 
The Queen of the Clones a triad must do her job or be turned into a swan *end*

Deltas

The Deltas are alters trained to carry out special missions resulting in 
death *end* The Deltas who are inactive are asleep *end* They must be activated *end* The 
programming to activate them will be triggered if a mission is given or if 
certain parts of the deeper parts of the system are tampered with *end* Deltas 
will work as a team with the Beta’s to kill *end* An Illuminati System will be 
"magically" twinned during programming to be a Twin with another 
system’s Delta alters *end* And these two systems in turn are joined in 
programming with another  person team so that  person and  person 
teams can be constructed *end* This gives the Illuminati more flexibility in what 
kind of missions it can send its slave out on *end*  person assassination teams 
are very common *end* They had  four-man Monarch slave assassination 
teams at Waco Texas the day that the Waco Branch Davidian building 
burned up *end* 
How The Deltas Are Created

Illuminati Deltas are linked to the moon children and are the offspring of 
the moon child alter in the early cage programming *end* In the early s the 
Illuminati would take a child and force it to watch another child who they 
have bonded with be incinerated alive in a crematorium at high heat which 
would not only melt the child but turn it to ashes *end* The form of the child in 
ashes would stay in the shape of the child until the crematorium door 
which would have glass in it for viewing would be opened *end* A small gust of 
air would cause the ashes to lose their shape *end* Watching through glass and 
feeling the fire and hearing the child scream was a trauma for any child *end* 
The Presideo and some of the Illuminati-run funeral homes which had this 
type of crematorium were employed for fire traumas *end* The fire trauma was 
done so that the child would visualize melting from heat *end* This melting 
trauma would then form the basis of the good witch/bad witch 
programming where water on a witch makes her melt like in the Wizard of 
Oz story *end* The Delta and Beta alters are then to trance into their melted 
state whenever their programmers want them to function *end* Their 
functioning state is the "melted state" *end* The programming is that the witches 
melt down to NOTHING *end* 

After a few years the programmers realized that they didn’t have to have a 
real trauma to get the programming done because they could usually do it 
with a combination of hallucinatory drugs hypnotic drugs and paper dolls *end* 
Paper dolls which when cut out are all joined together would be placed on 
a grid similar to an alter grid on a platform *end* The right hypnotic suggestions 
are made and the child believes these paper dolls are alive and are burned 
up *end* If the paper dolls didn’t work they’d go back to using a real child to 
get the job done *end* Later the lower cat alters are taught how to be hunted 
and hunt at the "life or death" Beltaine hunts *end* These hunts helped train 
alters which are then used to create the Deltas *end* The Deltas are not 
completed until later *end* 

To create a trained assassin the alters were desensitized towards pain and 
death by being shown gory films with the eyes forced open *end* Hypnosis was 
also used *end* The potential victims were devalued it is believed the Aryan 
alters which are very elitist and racist are used for Delta alters *end* Satanic 
rituals were also involved in the creation of the Deltas *end* Deltas will be 
trained in hand to hand combat--and know certain vulnerable places to kill 

people incl *end* breaking the neck *end* Training included a great deal of weapons 
training *end* In an early programmed multiple System which was created and 
programmed in Nazi Germany in the s the assassination alters are 
placed behind a wall of ice *end* When the wall of ice is melted these 
assassination alters are freed and they will go about their assignment to kill 
by using an ice-pick type needle poked into the heart of their prey *end* These 
Systems were infiltrated into the U.S *end* during the s to build a 
foundation for when the Nazi’s expected to win the war *end* Later American 
Delta alters were taught the art of assassination by poking a needle through 
the eye of the victim *end* This kind of assassination is apparently hard to 
detect *end* 
How The Deltas Are Activated

The access codes for the Deltas are structured different than for the rest of 
the System except for the sexual/entrapment/espionage alters who are 
designed very similar *end* The Deltas may be black color coded *end* 
When the programmer wants to use these Delta alters he will call them up 
from their genii bottle or wherever they are hidden deep in the mind *end* They 
will be commanded to melt *end* When they have melted into the nothing state 
then the programmer gives an exact script of everything the Delta alter is 
to do just like you would program a computer step by step-- from step a to 
step z *end* For instance the programmer might say "At a certain place you 
will be in the melted state until you hear the words "I’m going to Kansas 
City where are you from Miss Ruby shoes?" at that point you will remain 
in the melted state and do part B of the script." As the programmer 
continues with the script a Delta fragment will be given NWO codes bank 
account numbers and major sports numbers so other NWO folks know 
who is going to win ahead of time *end* This fragment will simply be a mental 
floppy disk *end* The Delta-Beta alters are habitually lied to by their 
programmers when they are given their detailed scripts *end* If they are 
carrying cocaine they may be told it is soap for needy children *end* If they 
shoot someone then they will be told all kinds of lies about the person 
they are to kill *end* They never are really given a chance to step outside of 
their deep trance and to ever hear the truth about what they are doing *end* They 
live their lives in a surreal fantasy world where nothing really makes sense *end* 

They don’t try to think for themselves they just follow orders *end* 
Since a mission may call for other alters to hold the body the programmer 
must put together his Delta script so that two scripts can be intertwined *end* 
The programmer may work out something so that the Delta alter goes into 
a temporary sleep in the melted state while out on the mission *end* This way 
the programmer doesn’t have to be present on the trip to bring the Delta 
alter back into its functioning "melted" state *end* The Delta alters can’t be out 
too long anyway because they are not used to functioning in the outside 
world and they get tired fast *end* Several Delta alters can switch so that they 
keep having a fresh Delta alter come out but eventually every one begins 
to get tired *end* That is another reason they will work in another script with 
front alters *end* 

The front alters are used to holding the body everyday *end* The front alters 
will take a vacation while the Deltas work on their detailed script of 
carrying secret messages and maybe killing someone *end* During an airplane 
trip a travel alter will hold the body while the Deltas sleep in the melted 
state *end* Delta alters who by the way have photographic memories are given 
their scripts by programmers not run-of-the-mill handlers *end* Everything is 
too fine tuned in the programming for a run-of-the-mill handler *end* Delta 
alters have an internal hour glass this hour glass may be a mural in their 
internal world that they look at *end* As long as they are obedient the hour 
glass sands do not fall *end* If they are disobedient the sand begins falling and 
their life is on the line *end* There is no room for mistakes *end* If the sand runs out 
death is to happen *end* Large hourglasses are often displayed in front of Delta-
Beta slaves to remind them that there is no room for mistakes no slack for 
disobedience *end* 

Their thinking is buried in fairy tales *end* They are programmed to see 
themselves in fairy tales they are programmed not to see their handlers or 
anybody’s else’s face for that matter *end* Their handlers pretend they are fairy 
tale characters or aliens *end* These alters do not have a chance to understand 
what they are doing *end* If the programmers get tired of the slave’s 
programming breaking down--and it does in part due to the severe abuse 
they get from these sadistic programmers/handlers then they will simply 
give the slave an assignment in which the slave will end up dying i.e *end* a 

suicide mission *end* This type of suicide mission is happening all over the 
United States with great frequency *end* An example would be a lady who is 
getting too wise about the New World Order so a Delta is assigned to 
crash their car into the lady and its written down as "just an unfortunate 
ACCIDENT with fatalities." A shop owner refuses to pay the Mafia for 
protection; so a Delta vandalizes and tears up the shop and has a fatal 
shootout with the police *end* 
Foreign Language Alters

The Illuminati/intelligence agencies realized when they started making 
slaves with photographic memories that they could create different parts of 
a slave’s mind to operate on different languages *end* Illuminati hierarchy 
systems will employ foreign language alters for several purposes 
    a *end* to facilitate the alter working in various situations for example 

French is helpful to work with Catholics in Quebec and with the 
Cambodian/Vietnamese criminal syndicate that the Illuminati set up 
in this nation *end* A high profile example of this is Bo Gritz an officer 
of the Delta Force who due to his photographic mind created via 
brain stem scarring can speak Mandarin Chinese *end* Mandarin Chinese 
is not normally an easy language for Americans *end* 
    b *end* to hide things in a system *end* 

Examples of this include code words attached to Greek and Hebrew letters 
for body programs *end* Another example is having latin phrases for accessing 
deeper parts *end* If an entire area of a system is put in a foreign language and 
the system is not given any alters capable of translation then you have 
very effectively isolated an entire section *end* For instance systems are being 
created in their early teens which are sectioned off into  or more 
languages say for instance German Spanish French Italian and Arabic *end* 
Some of the Systems created in the late s already were employing 
some of this *end* Since the very best Illuminati programmer in the world is 
European and speaks several languages you can expect to start to see more 
and more of this "Tower of Babel" programming multi-language systems 
where parts can’t communicate *end* 

The reader realizes that such multi-language capabilities are always secret 
until the person starts breaking down the programming *end* The programmers 
tell alter systems that God wants this programming done because God 
confounded all the languages & then spread people into the  corners of 
the world *end* 
Gatekeeper Alters

The Gatekeeper alters are just that *end* They protect the gates or portals to all 
System levels *end* Infrequently the programmers may also call them 
"doorkeepers" or "tollmen" & "toll women" *end* The victim may refer to them 
as guards or blockers although Gatekeepers are more than guards they are 
an entrance or portal to something *end* Gatekeepers may often be the alter that 
was split to get a particular section *end* Each gatekeeper may be at a deeper 
level trance than the one before it *end* When a Gatekeeper is split it creates a 
natural link to the alters that are created from itself *end* Then the Gatekeepers 
are given programming not to see what they have created and what they 
are natural portals to *end* These steps create a natural portal for the deeper 
alters *end* One-way mirrors are usually installed between the Gatekeeper and 
the section they guard so that the deeper alters can see out but the 
Gatekeeper can’t see in *end* Besides splitting off entire sections from the 
Gatekeepers clown alters will be created from them to keep the 
Gatekeepers in line *end*

alters they are taken to a door and by behavior modification techniques i *end* e *end* severe torture they are taught not to go beyond the door *end* They are to 
hold their place and not step through the door *end* Then they are strongly

 Egyptian Armies

The Egyptian armies are hundreds of fragments which have been 
programmed to have uniforms and to function as parts of an army *end* The 

main gods or spirits of Egyptian magic may be the names of the captains 
of the armies such as the following names Isis Osirus Horus Set and Ra *end* 
Thoth can be another name *end* In the Temple of Set alters with Egyptian 
names abound and aren’t restricted to fragment armies *end* The armies are 
built to protect various internal structures *end* 

The technique to make these armies are to torment the victim child in such 
a way that they make the child very angry *end* At the peak of the child’s rage 
they split the mind *end* The result is lots of child alter fragments which are 
angry *end* These are collected and shaped into an angry army of little children *end* 
When an adult Monarch slave triggers a protective army the adult alter 
finds themselves with angry children alters who are like a large crowd of 
toddlers who are screaming their heads off *end* There is no way to reason with 
these child fragments *end* Imagine trying to reason with a little  year who is 
screaming *end* Without anyway to reason with them--the adult alter has little 
defense against such an army *end* 
Flooding Alters

Flooding alters can be used as singles or as a group of alters *end* There is 
almost always a number of flooding alters in a system *end* They are developed 
by using drugs which lower dissociative barriers *end* The drugs were used 
when these alters held the body and the drugs caused all the dissociative 
walls to come down *end* These alters hold the memory of this flooding *end* 
Drugged alters in weird states can also be pulled up to make a system 
feeling crazy *end* 
Gems

The Gem alters are early child splits *end* These alters are treated as bad as 
possible *end* They are literally defecated upon and pissed upon *end* They are 
intentionally dehumanized and taught to think as little as possible about 
themselves *end* At some point these alters who have no self-esteem are told 
that they are something precious as Satan’s gems *end* But they are warned that 
if they ever talk to someone on the outside bombs will go off *end* Various 
bomb mechanisms are constructed using other alters and imagery *end* If these 
bombs go off these alters will be so dysfunctional incoherent and in 

shock that the therapist will not be able to work with the System again *end* 
The Gems are then used to transmit the mind of Satan to the System *end* 
Beyond the gems and the hour glass disciples there may be a stage which 
has more memories hidden *end* If a therapist gets that far see how to raise the 
curtain *end* 
Looking Glass People

The "Looking Glass Images" is the Illuminati name for mirror image 
alters who are split off of main alters in order to confuse everyone but the 
controller *end* Sometimes these alters can be spotted because an alter will say 
"I don’t know if I’m inside or outside I think I’m inside." As previously 
mentioned many alters also have shadow alters created from themselves to 
take their pain *end* It will be appropriate to discuss the overlays that the 
Illuminati place over real alters *end* The Illuminati will try to hide real alters 
with pseudo alters mirror alters mirror images and other tricks *end* Some 
alters are demons and others are simply illusions of the mind *end* Shell alters 
prevent therapists from talking to the real alters *end* 
Mirror Images

Mirror images are purpose fragments whose job is to confuse both victim 
and therapist *end* When an event happens the abusers will fragment the alter 
who participated in the event and create mirror images of that alter *end* This 
means that no one has the full memory *end* An alter doesn’t know if the mirror 
image is itself or something else *end* It’s very confusing *end* A triangle is formed 
by 
    a *end* an alter    b *end* its mirror images    c *end* demonic mirror images *end* 

When an alter tries to recover a memory it goes round and round in a 
vicious cycle and finally concludes the memory is false *end* If one alter holds 
a memory an alter close to it will have no feelings attached to the memory 
and will find it difficult to accept the memory as its own *end* It’s like wearing 
someone else’s coat it may fit but it just isn’t your own *end* Mirror images & 

pseudo-alters are layered in so that it becomes perplexing to identify 
where an alter starts & where it ends *end* Therapists may think they have 
integrated alters & actually only integrated their mirror images *end* 

Looking Glass People are similar to the mirror images *end* The Programmers 
may create a looking glass alter by having a drugged alters of the victim 
endure the trauma of seeing someone’s face peeled *end* Then the victim’s face 
is also pretended to be peeled--by pulling off something like elmer’s glue 
which has formed a surface on the victim’s face *end* Then the dead person’s 
skin is placed over the victim being programmed *end* The Looking Glass 
People are charted on grids and contain lots of the programs *end* They are 
confusing to the regular alters because they appear internally like mirror 
images *end* 
Programmer Alters 

Internal programming alters which are "clone images" of the  primary 
external programmers will be placed into a Monarch system *end* Of course the 
programmers want to remain anonymous so these programming alters are 
faceless & wear white robes *end* They are given vast power in the authority 
structure of a system & can move wherever they need to move *end* When 
programming is discussed by a victim & therapist they will appear *end* 
Reporting Alters

These alters are programmed to record everything *end* They lack an overview 
of reality *end* They are child parts that only know their job *end* The reporting 
alters will be involved in the recontact cues *end* Recontact alters are alters 
which are unaware of the abuse *end* The programmers may promise these 
recontact alters favors if they "report to Daddy." For years many therapists 
have worked with clients and never realized that the secret and well hidden 
reporting alters were reporting everything back to the handler *end* 

Scrambling Alters

This is one of the hardest type of programs for the victim to master *end* To 
make sure that the victim’s mind is very alert a drug is given which clouds 

the thinking *end* The alters must try exceptionally hard if they are to 
concentrate and learn what their job is *end* They will learn how to take 
something being said and scramble it *end* When alters are not supposed to hear 
something these alters will be called up by the internal programmers & 
they will sit on top of other alters and scramble everything they hear *end* 
These alters are technicians who usually enjoy the mastery they have over 
their difficult assignment *end* Therapists can give them a new job scrambling 
incoming cult messages *end* Scrambling programs linked to triggers for 
scrambling alters have at times been given names such as "AC DC" & 
"FLIP FLOP."

Sexual Alters

The early sexual trauma is designed to familiarize the child with sex and 
to access the primal part of the mind *end* The torture and sexual abuse 
eventually becomes gratifying to the mind *end* The mind does a reversal pain 
becomes pleasure *end* At any rate the programmers are trying to get a type of 
nymphomaniac *end* They accomplish this on one level *end* The sexual alters have 
no feelings attached to what they do and their masters never allow them to 
enjoy sex *end* They are not to have climaxes although they may be coached
