Portals And Focal Points

Within the occult world the entire study of demonology is wrapped 
around the geometric shapes that serve as focal points for demons such as 
made by crystals and pyramids and the portals by which demons can 
enter the human body *end* A demon doesn’t have to be materialized conjured 
up to enter into a body *end* Geometric shapes which are believed to attract 
demons are placed into the internal worlds of slaves *end* 

The will of the person also plays a role in the introduction of demons into 
the body *end* Torture attaches and layers in demons within the body *end* Sex and 
blood sacrifices are used to attach powerful demons *end* 

According to high level demonology certain powerful spirits can only be 
manipulated if there are blood sacrifices *end* This may seem strange however 
the record evidence bears out that generational victims of possession who 
have had demons placed in via blood sacrifices are definitely controlled by 
more powerful demonic forces *end* All of the chahkra points and the orifices 
to the human body serve as portals *end* Both the Illuminati and Christian 
deliverance ministries agree that the mouth ears nose anus etc *end* are 
portals *end* 

High influxes of demonic energy into the body is accompanied by a 
burning sensation *end* The Mother of Darkness who is assigned to a child who 
is being programmed has to oil the child periodically to protect it from this 
burning *end* 

The goal to possess someone of spirits or to be possessed by spirits has 
been practiced since the early times of mankind *end* In Llewellyn’s New 
Worlds of Mind and Spirit magazine June/July  issue # they 
write "The golem of Prague is perhaps the most famous example of 
‘practical cabala’--the use of cabala for magical cabala." Scholem in his 

excellent treatise on the Cabala has an entire chapter about the Golem *end* The 
golem were mind-controlled slaves created by the magick of the Cabala *end*

Pike in his famous Morals and Dogma book is the basis of Freemasonry *end*

golem has been the goal of Freemasonry because that goal is the best 
example of practical cabala.This is the paper trail that lets us view the 
secret goals of the secret world of Freemasonry *end*

by the higher and more occult Masonic rites in the  century *end* These

were subjected to all types of perverse magical rituals *end* The Cabala teaches 
intercourse with demons *end* Theurgy is the skill or ability to invoke demons 
variously called angels of light genii spirits of various kinds such as 
elemental spirits *end* Demons come with a price and that price is blood *end*

require blood to be sacrificed to pull in certain demons *end*

and mixed in a certain ceremony to invoke a particular demon *end* Demons are

invoked by placing alcoholic enemas into the child *end* These children get

the child victim to Satan *end* Satan may be called Set in the ritual *end* There are

purple robe *end* It is placed inside the pentegram and an "altar" which is made

inscribed with the inscription "Nebebka" on the neck or forehead *end* Then the

liver removed *end* The  spirits of the  watchtowers are invoked *end* The slave 
child being baptized is smeared with fat from the dead beast *end* The 
Gatekeeper spirit is called by ringing a bell *end* Then the child is placed into 
the animal’s belly *end* A part of the raw liver is given to the child and the rest 
consumed by the group *end* The child is then baptized in blood *end* A cut called 
the Devil’s Seal is placed on the child on the left hand or under the armpit

Foundation *end* The Priest reads out of the Book of Satan and the Book of 
Names *end* The victim repeats after the Priest *end* In this fashion the Priest ritually

by the cult to oppose Netsah Victory-the sphere on the bottom right of

conjured *end* At times this ritual is done with a child sacrifice rather than an

Part I
Layering In Demons

The American Journal of Psychotherapy two noted psychiatrists and an M *end* D *end* from India wrote an article "Multiple Personality in India Comparison 
with Hysterical Possession State" *end* The tenor of the article was that in 
India the psychiatrists have to deal with demonic possession rather than 
MPD which is found in the west *end* They made comparisons of demonic 
possession in India to the MPD of the west which are similar but not the 
same *end* Later other articles and letters were written about this article *end* 

One of the criticisms was that these Indian psychiatrists were trying to 
compare their demonic possession to the west’s MPD when it was obvious 
that their cases of demonic possession did not meet all the criteria of MPD *end* 
In the experience of the co-authors of this book demonic possession is not 
MPD DID but it does have many of the same characteristics *end* If we 
understand programming from the Programmers point of view they 
believe in both MPD and Demonic possession *end* From the programmers

ex-Programmers have told Fritz that if a person really wants to understand

control can not be separated from demonology and occult ritual *end* Even the

programming *end*

its  mystic names *end* An unbaptized child who has been taken from 

Christian parents is in the middle of the Pentagram and a live altar

the  directions and then turned face down toward the east *end* The child must

purple cloth *end* Flesh is cut from the child and mixed with black millet and 
given to Satan also called Sheitan *end* Prayers in Enochian are said *end* Incense 
is lit *end* The child is now sacrificed to Satan using the ritual athame perhaps 
a black handled dagger while the child is condemned by the cult to hell *end*

members *end*

HOW THE PROGRAMMERS UNDERSTAND DEMONOLOGY

Demonology is the key to what the programmers accomplish *end* Some recent 
efforts to expose the Monarch Mind Control have portrayed the 
programmers as very cynical about their "magick" *end* While there may be 
exceptions to the rule within the Illuminati demonology is not taken 
lightly but is considered to be the real science of the Sciences of Mind 
Control *end* 

The goal of the Illuminati programmers is stated in their own writings in 
latin"Quod superius est sicut quod inferius et quod inferius est sicut quod 
superius ad perpetranda miracula rei unius..." Meaning that their goal is 
to achieve the wonders of the "one thing" where "that which is above is 

like that which is below and that which is below is like that which is 
above." 

In other words they take the dark spiritual realm of Satan as the pattern 
for the world *end* This latin phrase is also used to support astrology which 
influences some of the programming decisions *end* The concept of astrology

So what is demon possession in Haiti’s Voodooism *end* According to the 
Haitians a spirit which they call "loa" joins a person like a rider mounts a 
horse *end* The spirit then controls the person like a rider *end* The possessed person 
is called a "chual" which means horse and the spirit is said to mount or 
saddle his victim *end* Blood sacrifices are often associated with the demon 
and the possessed person will drink the blood from the sacrificed animal *end* 
Polished stones and herbs and trance and dissociative states are used to 
attract spirits *end* While the Monarch slaves have trauma-based dissociative 
states the practitioners of Voodoo have ritually induced dissociative states *end* 
Voodoo rituals will involve chanting drums at times handclapping and 
frenzied dancing to induce the dissociative states *end* 
In fact several features have been identified which bring about 
dissociative states in the black religions of the Caribbean and South 
America *end* First they have dancing to a pronounced and rapid beat *end* Next the 

induction into the dissociative state frequently follows a period of 
starvation and/or overbreathing hyperventilation *end* The beginning of the 
demonic possession is characterized by a brief period of muscle 
inhibitions or a collapse *end* The person who is experienced at being 
possessed acquires a specific behavior pattern for the deity that is 
supposedly controlling it *end* And finally the head and limbs may tremor 
under trance and the person may become dissociative enough that they 
can pick up red hot irons *end* The possessed can be conscious semiconscious 
or unconscious *end* 

Studies made of this situation where an entire nation like Haiti actively 
seeks demonic possession allows us to discount some explanations and get 
a better picture of what demon possession isn’t *end* It also helps to understand 
what is involved in demonic possession *end* The first major authoritative work

been too much for some people to believe *end* Still if people stop to realize

Saint Dominque while it was a plantation colony are  *end* The 
conditions on the island for the slaves was like a Nazi work camp *end* The

crucible of the severe torture of slavery the slaves formed Haitian voodoo

African vaudou was these slaves only power against their cruel plantation 
owners and is partly credited for helping Haiti become the first free black 
republic in the revolution of  *end*

been equated with Catholic saints and given the names of these saints *end*

India

Psychotherapy Jan *end*  p *end*  it states 

"However so far no case of double or multiple personality so 
labeled by a psychiatrist has been reported from India in the 
professional literature *end* Considering that hysterical 
disturbances in general are quite widespread in the country 
this is surprising *end* On the one hand it could mean an actual 
low prevalence of multiple personality in the country." 

For those of us who understand what is happening it is obvious why 
multiples aren’t found in India *end* The fact that multiples aren’t found in 
India ought to wake up people that multiple personalities is not "demon 
possession nor is it simply the result of bad parenting or everyday type of 
horrendous trauma *end* Almost everyone has a trauma in their early life and is 
somewhat dissociative but that doesn’t make them have multiple 
personalities which are programmed and have separate histories and altar 
names *end* India has over twice the population of the U.S *end* and yet no multiples 
reported *end*

their works."  COR - *end*

If a master has to constantly spend time whipping and motivating his slave as

The intelligence agencies knew that they would have to create mind control 
slaves who could police themselves *end* If the master has to constantly guard his 
slave the slave will be more trouble than he is worth *end* 

Many successful people have gained their success because they knew how to 
delegate *end* The most successful supervisor is the one who can delegate the best *end* 
The programmers had to find ways to cut their supervisory requirements to 
the bone if they were to make owning a Monarch slave worthwhile *end* The 
method chosen was to build "computers" into the slave’s mind that would 
internally regulate everything *end* They do this by taking hundreds of the alters 
and dehumanizing them and turning them into parts of a computer *end* 

For instance the shutter on the All-seeing eye of the computer which is seen 
in the mind like a camera shutter is a child alter who's job is to open and shut *end* 
Another primal part is inside the eye’s pupil *end* This shutter part knows what 
goes on in all the system subconsciously but if discovered by a therapist and 
pulled to the front of the mind will not be able to vocalize about the system *end* 
The software for this "computer" could be programmed into it and all the 
individual programming of every alter can then be tied back to the computer *end* 
In other words each alter would be programmed on how to view life to act 
to think and to function in their job *end* This programming would be linked to a 
computer *end* 

The programmers invented the perfect method to decentralize their control 
over their slaves and yet still supervise with the tightest of control *end* Each alter 
is linked to a computer internal-not an external one built from a foundation 
of fear and trauma *end* Since each section of alters was to remain secret each 
section of alters for a slave is given its own computer and then linking 
computers were built to link the various sections and then finally a major 
backup computer is built and then finally the internal Beast computer *end* Bear in 
mind that this is all built internally in the mind of the victim *end* We are not 
talking about actual physical computers built out of physical microchips 

wires condensers etc *end* 
If the programmer concentrates on a single point when giving instructions he 
will get better results *end* Rather than complicating things for the slave you gain 
power over the slave and any subordinate if you can give simple clear 
instructions *end* For this reason a large share of the alters in an alter system are 
given very clear straight forward jobs *end* Because their jobs are so 
straightforward these alters will often remain fragments rather than alter 
parts with full blown personalities *end* The programmers don’t cloud the issue *end* 
An undeveloped alter will be given one single clear basic job *end* By stringing

can be created *end* 
Each piece of the System is separated by some degree of dissociation to make 
it a separate piece *end* By dividing the mind so much it is incapable of fighting 
what has been done to itself *end* Before we begin describing the technical details

Of The Beast Computers

network of computers--the computers have access codes similar to

codes that the UNIX universal system uses and the Monarch slaves are being

some systems if the computer is shutdown it will request an input code of 
fffffffff...This can then be reversed FFFFFFFFFF *end* 

The UNIX system is being used to allow the New World Order’s big BEAST 
computers to communicate with any known computer including the minds of 

their Monarch mind-controlled slaves *end* In the s the U.S *end* Department of 
Defense began linking computers together into a superhighway now 
developed into the Internet *end* Hundreds of thousands of computers around the 
world are tied in *end* Like buildings in a city each computer has its own unique 
address *end* Most of these addresses are registered at the Network Information 
Center in Menlo Park CA *end* Individuals can also be registered at the NIC too *end*

networks which tie together such divergent things as MIT computers West 
Point computers NORAD computers Alr Force Systems Command Space 
Division computers at El Segundo CA and U.S *end* Army DARCOM at 
Seckenheim Ger *end* to name a few *end* These are all being tied together to form 
one vast electronic brain *end*

twin-engine craft *end* Victims for the programming are brought in via planes & 

other routes *end*

The particular programs for the economic transactions just described are a 
worldwide computer network called SWIFT Society For Worldwide 
Interbank Financial Transactions *end* The SWIFT works off of the UNIX system 
and can communicate with any computer *end* It was developed by AT&T and 
uses C language *end* Bear in mind that there are dialects of UNIX such as the 
standard AT&T UNIX and for instance Berkeley UNIX *end* The UNIX system 
uses both timesharing and multitasking *end* 

The mind of a Monarch slave also does both multitasking and time sharing *end*

the Monarch programming *end* A kernal is what the UNIX programmers call a 
"protected person" *end* It is very similar to the internal "person" alter who helps 

the Monarch slave’s programming functions *end* 

The big item about UNIX is that it has permissions granted *end* This is similar to 
the Monarch programming *end* Permissions are granted to  types of entities *end* The

permission type is the world which has very limited access *end* The parallel 
between this and the Monarch programming is surprising *end* In some cases the 
programmers may have matched things on a one-to-one correspondence *end*

C *end* Internal Hierarchies

The programmers build chains of command within the groups of alters that 
they create *end* They credit themselves with bringing order out of chaos *end* When a 
system of multiple personalities thinks of rebelling they are in the similar 
situation as a colony wanting freedom from its mother country *end* 

Can we govern ourselves and what governing structures can we keep--since 
the structure itself is colonial *end* Can the mind work together to help itself *end* The 
concerns are legitimate questions *end* And yes the multiple’s mind can function

without alters taking on different job assignments *end* In the slave’s hierarchal 
chain of command adult alters are assigned to insure that child alters don’t 
get out unless the abusers want a child alter out *end* Likewise commander alters 
are needed to keep the switching smooth and to keep things orderly *end* 
Subordinate alters are taught to submit to their king or governor or queen 
alter *end* Immense power and indoctrination is given to the key cult alters ruling a 
system *end* 

The internal hierarchial arrangement means that the host alter coming into 
therapy often a Christian may not be as completely open as therapists think *end* 
They must play an internal game of going toward health while not pushing the 
buttons of deeper more powerful alters *end* A lot of internal politics may go on *end* A 
front alter may promise a deeper alter secrecy in order to consult with it *end* This 
makes for all kinds of triangulation and manipulation within the alter system 

itself *end* The entire hierarchy of alters has a lot invested in protecting the core 
from trauma which was why the core was split in the beginning *end* Trad *end*

The Science Of External Controls
Monitoring Asset Control

Every intelligence service since time began has sought methods of owning people and ensuring 
they stayed loyal *end* Two of  Illuminati families who are known to have developed extremely 
well-run bloodline intelligence groups are the Li family and the Rothschild family *end* The Li’s 
family started its Chinese intelligence back in  A.D *end* They had already been an ancient 
chinese aristocratic family for many centuries prior to this *end* Some of their techniques for their 
agents were state of the art mind control techniques *end* The Rothschild’s personal spy network and 
their own mail service was known to be superior to the national european governments during 
the  century *end* Traditional spycraft has involved the ability to recruit and keep agents loyal *end* 
The professional spook manipulates his recruits for a living *end* He becomes adept at controlling 
people *end* 

For thousands of years spy operations have honed their skills at controlling people *end* Because 
they work secretly they generally have done whatever they wanted *end* When you combine the 
resources and centuries of intelligence operations of the Illuminati along with the credibility of 
government intelligence agencies supposedly guarding our national security the combination is 
horrific *end* There are no moral or financial restraints on what is being done *end* If the intelligence 
groups want to dabble in keeping a severed head alive apart from the body or a frozen body 
with an active head which they have done there is no one to stop them *end* Handlers of slaves use 
both natural and contrived cues to convey to the slave that they want obedience *end* 

A natural non-verbal threat cue would be brusque movements and an innuendo in their voice *end* A 
contrived cue would be placing both hands behind the head which is a code for "I AM YOUR 
MASTER OBEY ME." Another cue for slaves to obey is when the master makes a fist with his 
right hand and touches his forehead *end* This means "OBEY." Even children who were multiples 
who were being taught to control their mother who wanted to leave the cult have been observed 
using the fist to the forehead to try to get obedience from their mother *end* Staring is one method 
that the Programmers use *end* Charles Manson who was both a slave and a handler is an example 
of how a penetrating hypnotic stare is used by the Programmers *end* 

One way to control people is to wear clothes of authority *end* Dr *end* Green Dr *end* Black Dr *end* Star 
Michael Aquino and other programmers have worn Nazi uniforms while programming and at 
other time have worn Satanic Priestly garb *end* 

A beginning point to control people is understanding human needs and understanding the 
individual to be controlled *end* A good case officer learns everything he can about the asset person 
or slave he is to control *end* Case officers/handlers have been constantly working at improving their 
skills of control *end* Monarch slaves who must function as intelligence officers who recruit spies 
are trained in the art of listening and conversation *end* 

Learning to listen without interrupting is a guarantee of success *end* CIA handlers/ programmers 
have an extremely personable side to them--and a very deadly animalistic side to them too *end* They 
will be trained to look anyone they want to recruit in the eyes and withstand their stare *end* 

"Friendship begins with a smile; recruitment with a stare." This is a quote from the 
book Suvorov Viktor *end* Inside The Aquarium *end* New York Macmillan p *end*

During training men in U.S *end* Army Intelligence are told to read this book to understand how U *end* S *end* intelligence works *end* The entire lives of Monarch slaves are kept on records *end* Zbigniew 
Brezinski and the heads of the CIA and Sec *end* of Defense Cheney are just some of the men 
known about who have access to the computer records that contain records on every active 
Monarch slave *end* 

Not everyone has a price but everyone will respond to their needs being met *end* James K *end* Van 
Fleet an important military intelligence officer wrote about how to manage people *end* In military 
intelligence they keep files on people where they identify which subconscious desires of people 
are important to the person at the time *end* 

All this information is kept in SOFT FILES--which are not official files so these files have 
never officially existed and are not given up even to Congressional subpoenas *end* The Intelligence 
agencies know that if they find out what the person wants above all else in life they can control 
the person *end* The nine areas that are monitored to see if they are important at the moment are

 *end* emotional security
 *end* recognition of efforts or reassurance of worth
 *end* creative outlets
 *end* a sense of personal power
 *end* a sense of roots--belonging somewhere
 *end* immortality
 *end* ego-gratification
 *end* love in all its forms
 *end* new experiences

Once they monitor these areas and then they determine which needs are priority needs for the 
person then they will use what they call "the depth approach" to subconsciously gratify those 

needs in a way that they gain control over the person *end* Modern companies are doing this too *end* 
Dough mix isn’t sold but making a family memory with the children is *end* Soap isn’t sold to get 
dishes clean--but rather soft beautiful hands are sold *end* Cosmetic companies don’t sell an item--
they sell you hope or an image *end* Fruit dealers don’t sell fruit they sell health and vitality *end* Car 
dealers don’t sell cars they sell prestige and images *end* Freezers aren’t sold emotional security 
from having a full freezer is sold *end* They have learned to genuinely appeal to the  subconscious 
desires *end* 

In intelligence these desires are called "weaknesses" because intelligence case officers and 
handlers will attempt to manipulate those desires for their own gain by sincerely helping the 
person *end* They set up short-range & long term goals and plans on how to manage a person *end* 
For instance if a Monarch slave’s day to day alters want ego-gratification a creative outlet and 
reassurance of worth the Illuminati may promise the slave that if the alters comply they will 
give them a singing contract in Las Vegas *end* If they need to appeal to their emotional security--
they can promise a big salary and a nice house *end* If they need to appeal to immortality they can 
promise to award them a star on Hollywood Boulevard or whatever religious immortality they 
can credibly offer *end* The slave will get the short end of any deal *end* Anything the slave gets is 
going to come at a price *end* The slave will have to do something in return for the Network *end* 
Illuminati alters are promised power honor glory and wealth *end* Considering the power and wealth 
of the elite they do have the resources to make good on this if they want *end* However the price of 
obedience might be to shave one’s head in submission and sacrifice a child *end* 

Another important point is that the abusers want to get the active cooperation of the person being 
used *end* This can be accomplished by lies or facts if they are convenient which appeal to the 
person’s views of right and wrong *end* For instance a pedophile will talk to the child who they are 
going to rape to get its cooperation *end* The CIA handlers will listen to what a Slave needs and 
solve it for them *end* 

Bear in mind they will only do this if the slave doesn’t live with the handler and is pulling in the 
wrong direction *end* For instance the CIA has lots of sleepers who are dangerous people just 
waiting to be set off *end* In these cases the CIA has to work with front alters who aren’t aware of 
the mind control *end* Rather than force an issue with control sometimes a gentle manipulation will 
work *end* Then again some slave alters are under such strong mind control that they simply need an 
order and don’t need gentle manipulation *end* 
The isolation that the handlers impose on their slave to prevent real relationships with outsiders 
and the strong bonding of the slave to its master trauma bonding etc *end* that is administered via 
the mind control actually provides a chance for freedom IF the slave survives its master’s death *end* 

Most slaves are programmed to die soon after their master dies--the co-author Cisco was *end* If the 

slave survives the suicide programming the Illuminati will have already taken into consideration 
who the slave will be passed onto *end* Cisco’s system survived their programmer/master’s death 
and they were not able to break the intense bonds which made the System loyal to that master *end* 
Because there is so much secret mind-control slavery going on if only a small percentage begin 
to break loose because their loyalty programming backfires on the Illuminati it has still given us 
on the other side a significant break *end*

Rothschild the President of Oilfield Scrap & Equipment in Kentucky committed suicide *end* He

Co *end*  So.d  La *end* App *end* rd Cir *end* --for worker’s compensation because she could not

needs *end* These are given in a way that they further lock the person in to the control *end* For instance 
the slave has been stripped of power he craves power--so he is given power over other people’s

occult bloodline and a cult family *end* 

Each Monarch slave exists in their own situation but there are often common features to how 
they are controlled *end* For instance the handlers like to restrict the mobility of their slaves *end* Some 
of the slaves will never write their own checks will never drive anywhere and will seldom

programming *end* Some slaves are allowed to drive but only on a limited basis and their sense of 
direction is stripped from them hypnotically *end*

...On a day in October  a woman named Lena Pepitone was hired to take care of Marilyn

 As time goes on the case officer or handler will weave and ever firming ever tightening web of 
control around his asset *end* They will often use rapport *end* Many of the CIA’s Monarch programmers

the game *end*

authors of this book are very familiar with some of these men *end* They are often big male Monarch

bruise after the access *end*

volkswagens *end* In the Oregon area especially Portland a full time Monarch slave enforcer 

named Rex drives his large red pickup or at times someone else’s other vehicle like his 
Illuminati boss’s white pickup truck *end* He will carry a gun and a cattle prod *end* The cars in some 
places have been often red or black *end* A white or silver car sometimes is used to denote someone 
of rank *end* When limousines are used to pick up slaves they may switch license plates regularly 
because the plates contain access codes *end* This was one reason the establishment began allowing 
people to customize their own license plates *end*

great *end* Some of those principles can be scaled down to working with individuals *end* 

Fritz has observed that almost across the board if slaves are left within a non-cult family

perceived as "moody" and "irrational" *end* Half-way decent cover stories will generally suffice to 
cover the slave’s activities for the mafia the CIA and the satanic cult they belong to *end* The slave 
merely needs to pull up a good front alter for public consumption for people want to think the 
best of everyone *end* The public will watch the -Swans fairy tale where a magical coat turns swans 
into a princess never guessing that a news story far greater is happening all around them *end* 

One way to control a person is to identify who the key people are in their life and then influence 
those people *end* Some of the work in controlling Monarch slaves goes on behind the scenes even 
without the slave ever realizing it *end* A number of Monarch slaves have been maneuvered into 
marriages without actual mind-control even being necessary *end* 

One of the items to successfully controlling people is that they know who they are taking orders 
from *end* In the military officers get frustrated because they end up getting conflicting orders from 
conflicting jurisdictions *end* This happens with the control of Monarch slaves too when too many 
chiefs and not enough indians are around *end* When a slave ends up serving several handlers within 
a short period of time they can get really messed up *end* This is because the slaves receive severe 
abuse and their programming can be splintered and destroyed if not handled correctly *end* Of 
course the slave takes the blame but that doesn’t eliminate the problem *end* 
If a handler wants a better chance of his slave functioning smoothly the slave shouldn’t be 
tampered with by lots of handlers *end* This common sense logic of management seems to have been 
missed by a large number of handlers *end* One thing can be said someone who is a common drug 
dealer had better not tamper with an Illuminati Mother of Darkness alter slave if they want to 
stay alive *end* It appears that slaves are seldom tampered with without permission *end* 

Another ingredient in controlling people is knowing what your competition is going to do *end* 
Because the cults work with the intelligence agencies they often know who what where when 
and how their enemies are going to challenge them *end* The authors of this book could write a book 

on how the Illuminati/intelligence agencies have watched them *end* People such as therapists and 
ministers who challenge the Monarch trauma-based programming have nice growing dossiers in

Planning A Typical Intelligence Operation Or The Standard 
Textbook Techniques Of A Modern Intelligence Agency

The following points are of a scenario which was developed as follows by 
the author Fritz observed how the CIA were carrying out an operation to 
recapture a Monarch slave who was trying to escape *end* These activities 
follow standard spook textbook methods and for instance fit the same 
patterns of an intelligence operation codenamed Operation Sphinx 
described in detail in the book By Way of Deception *end* By exposing how an 
operation is put together perhaps it will become clearer how the CIA 
monitor an asset they fear is escaping *end* 
POINT  *end* An event that looked like an accident was planned *end* The event 
was impossible to miss *end* This can include car accidents people waving one 
down to tell you that you have a flat tire etc *end* 
POINT  *end* They studied their prey to determine his/her routine *end* They will 
watch a residence intently to determine the person’s routine and take 
advantage of this *end* 
POINT  *end* Then an insignificant accidental event is planned *end* Repeatedly in 
the many Monarch people the authors have known the tiniest insignificant 
points in people’s lives are being manipulated *end* Bear in mind the 
intelligence people are carried away and overdo much of what they do 
even over planning some of their ops *end* 
POINT  *end* The chief is given the order to "hit at convenience." They are 
watching and probing to discover a weak point and when they find a weak 
point they will strike at convenience *end* 
POINT  *end* Listening devices are installed *end* The Illuminati’s intelligence 
agencies are illegally monitoring the Jives of Americans with bugs that go 
up to  Ghz *end* Companies like Tektronics which work with the CIA are 
selling counters which won’t detect bugs at  Ghz *end* In other words what is 
mainly sold the public is inadequate but BK Precision does sell a counter 
which goes past  Ghz *end* for those who want to know when they are being 
illegally spied upon *end* Since MI- & the CIA cooperate the CIA can simply 

say that their American intelligence information is from MI- *end* It may be 
illegal for the CIA to spy in the U.S.-ha *end* no one stops them but British MI-
 can legally spy on American citizens *end* The intell *end* groups themselves use 
BABBLERS which are electronic devices that emit noise & chatter & 
destroy the effectiveness of bugs *end* 
POINT  *end* Teams of experts are brought in to brainstorm about the 
operation *end* The people called in on a case will be coordinated by a team or 
teams *end* One of these teams will consist of various experts whose combined 
brains will give great ability to plan *end* 
POINT  *end* The person will be watched by moving in an observer into a 
nearby building *end* 
POINT  *end* An intelligence woman or man will be sent door to door selling 
perfume or something else--perhaps they will pose as Jehovah’s Witnesses *end* 
POINT  *end* The door to door undercover intelligence person will be very 
personable very nice to talk to *end* 
POINT  *end* The team will take all the surveillance information and spend 
hours going over every detail and they will debate and get tense as they 
hash out the significance of certain intelligence pieces of information as 
they work out a plan of action *end* 
POINT  *end* The Intelligence people will take advantage of the social needs 
of someone close to their prey *end* They might give his wife some 
opportunities for fun things away from the house *end* They know how to take 
advantage very quickly & smoothly of the social needs of people who are 
around a Monarch slave *end* They put used car salesmen to shame *end* 
POINT  *end* The intelligence people have the capability to enter without 
keys *end* 
POINT  *end* They practice "motionless following." That means they 
followed people in shifts *end* They will follow by tag teams so to speak and 
use car phones *end* 
POINT  *end* They like to use "trade" occupations as a cover *end* 
POINT  *end* The man will give a business card which had an actual office 
etc *end* but which was a front *end* They will be willing to give a business card--
which is a real address but only a CIA front *end* The day they realize they are 
exposed the phone will quit working *end* Handlers and men within the 
Network often use business cards and other cards they carry in their 
wallets as codes indicating various things *end* In intelligence operations the 
agents will take their "intelligence--that is the info they have collected and 
put it through  steps *end*  "direction" who is going to collect what where *end* 
 "collection" the actual spying *end*  "processing" analyzing and 
integrating what they have collected and  "dissemination" distributing 
via reports talks charts the analyzed and rewritten reports to their 
customers *end* Most of the intelligence groups have a reputation for distorting 
the truth in the third stage to fit their agency’s "party line" *end* Count St.-
Germain ?- is a good example of an intelligence officer *end* He was 
one of the leading Illuminati of his time *end* He did alchemy for Louis XV 
and magic for the Masonic leader Karl prince of Hesse *end* He spied for the 
Dutch and the French and who knows who else *end* His fundamental 
allegiance was to the Mystery Religions of the Illuminati *end* 
Modern day examples are Lord Victor Rothschild one of the leaders of 
MI- Sir Dick Goldsmith White Jewish Mason & leader of MI- from 
/- Sir John Rennie leader of MI- from - whose son Charles 
Tatham Ogilvy Rennie was a known major drug runner Major General 
Sir John Sinclair of the Illuminati MI- chief from ‘- *end* MI-S has had 
a number of Illuminati/Freemasons called Director-Generals rather than 
Chiefs running it too *end* Nigel West a pseudonym for a man who worked 
for MI- devoted an entire chapter in his book MI-S about how Hugh 
Astor and Victor Rothschild ran Britain’s double agent division *end* 

ALL I repeat ALL of the German agents spying on England during W.W *end* 
II were double-agents actually working for the British *end* If anyone tried to 
work for the German’s secret service who wasn’t disloyal that person

CIA Operations Involving George White

George White working for the MK Ultra Mind Control program supplied 
during the s a long list of prostitutes to the CIA for study *end* During the 
s the CIA was refining its knowledge of what makes a prostitute tick *end* 
How do you use them *end* How do you train them *end* How do you teach them to 
do both espionage and seduction *end* What are the elements of seduction *end* 

All these sciences were refined *end* For instance if a prostitute stays longer 
than she is paid for she will shock the john and he will find his ego 
greatly boosted *end* With the right methods the prostitute agent can elicit all 
types of secrets from the vulnerable male *end* With the ability to create Black 
Widow Spiders deadly seductive Monarch alters the Illuminati gained 
one more sure method to control others *end* Seduction and then blackmail *end* The 
CIA just as FBI J *end* Edgar Hoover did keeps detailed files on sexual 
preferences *end* It supplies what people want but the supply comes with a 
price that the individual is now under blackmail *end* 
B *end* Blackmail

This dirty game has been honed to a fine art which is a standard feature of 
the Illuminati/intelligence groups *end* The CIA term for blackmail is an "OK 
FIX." When they use a person’s past sins to force someone to do 
something they refer to this as "biographic leverage." Any weak point in a 
person can and will be exploited *end* Sexual entrapment for blackmail is 
referred to as a ‘HONEY TRAP" *end* Black widow alters are being trained and 
sent out for this purpose *end* 

Blackmail of the slave begins when it is beginning to get verbal *end* At  the 
cults will tell a child they have a bomb planted inside them that the cult 
can detonate if they don’t obey *end* In order to blackmail or threaten you 
have to have something to threaten the person with *end* Men are frequently 
entrapped by sexual behavior which is criminal *end* Sometimes they are also 
entrapped by murder *end* The Monarch slave will be allowed to have children 

so that they can be blackmailed into complying to save the children or 
grandchildren *end* The Monarch slave in turn may be used to blackmail others *end* 
Certain alters are trained in this *end* 

A Monarch Beta model is highly trained in seduction and will seduce a 
man *end* Then an alter which feigns death will take the body and the man will 
be threatened for having killed the woman *end* Many politicians and ministers 
are operating under blackmail today *end* When Jimmy Swaggart’s ministry 
fell over  Assembly of God ministers called headquarters and 
confessed that they had similar problems *end* The extent that blackmail is 
being used by the NWO would boggle people’s minds *end* Porn films are 
taken of the Monarch victims so that they can be used to blackmail the 
victim *end* Monarch victims are forced to commit ritual murders which are 
photographed and then used to blackmail the poor mind-controlled victim *end* 

Perhaps one of the cruelest forms of blackmail which is carried routinely 
by handlers is the threat to incarcerate the mind-controlled slave in a 
mental hospital *end* The co-author Fritz has read a number of books about the 
situation in America’s mental hospitals and sections of these books will 
literally make a person vomit from disgust *end* The legal climate in this nation 
has made it easy to stick someone else in a mental hospital *end* Once there 
they are routinely given tranquilizers Mellaril Thorazine or Stelazine so 
that they can’t rebel against the most wretched conditions *end* Nadine Scolla 
was a nurse in a mental hospital who wrote an expose based on her diary 
while she worked *end* Her book is entitled Keeper of the Keys Westlake 
Village CA F&J Publishing Corp *end*  The following are quotes from 
her account of working in a mental hospital 

"How can they allow such places to exist *end* They really need to 
reform but who is going to do it?. *end* .We’re supposed to be 
civilized and yet many people are treated worse than the 
lowest form of animals *end* Who cares about these patients *end* p *end* 
. *end* .Doctors receive one hundred thousand dollars a year 
starting salary and the nursing personnel receive the highest 
pay in the profession and yet the patients get the worst of 
care *end* p *end* . *end* .I could see that the patients had no rights here *end* 
p... *end* on page - she reports about a secret hospital 

grave yard where patients could be buried without anyone 
knowing. *end* .Do you remember the young rape victim and how 
they treated her - the girl with beautiful olive skin and long 
brown hair?.. *end* They filled the bath tub with cubes of large ice 
and dropped her into it *end* They removed her from that and 
placed her in scalding hot water *end* She came out red as a lobster *end* 
Her body was badly blistered *end* This treatment didn’t help so 
they decided upon shock treatment *end* ‘I never saw anything so 
awful in all my life *end* They forcibly strapped her down tied her 
hands and legs stuck the electrodes to her head and placed a 
tongue blade in her mouth *end* She couldn’t scream wiggle or do 
anything *end* After the treatment. *end* .Tammey was dead *end* Her body 
was limp - she was still trapped in the chair *end* It was more than I 
could take *end* I had to go off by myself and cry.’ p *end* I don’t 
understand how our local government can allow these people 
to be treated worse than a dog in the local pound *end* At least the 
animals have their own cubicle and their own food dish *end* 
p." According to what Nadine Scolla was told half of the 
patients in mental hospitals are schizophrenics *end* A hefty 
percentage of these "schizophrenics" are really programmed 
multiples who are being quietly discarded by the system *end* How 
many victims of trauma-based total mind-control have ended 
up sent to mental hospitals *end* Many tens of thousands maybe 
the exact number will never be known *end* America’s mental 
hospitals have also played an active role in the programming 
and the research for the programming *end* 
C *end* Bribes

Their skill at bribes is an extension of understanding human nature and 
human needs and wants *end* It works together with blackmail *end* 
D *end* The Control Of The Milieu

One of the basic ideas of creating a mind-controlled slave is to control the 
entire milieu of the slave *end* This is expressed in Nexus Seven *end* The 
environment of the slave is designed for what is called "story immersion." 

A Monarch slave who has been given the basic Alice In Wonderland and 
Wizard of Oz programming will see objects connected to these story lines 
in almost every store *end* Restaurants in Dallas and San Antonio The Time

Star Trek The Next Generation

Introductory Remarks 

For any recipe you need a cook *end* So who has been cooking up the RECIPE 
for making Monarch Slaves *end* The authors felt that after reading the recipe 
that some readers would be interested in learning about the master chefs 
who make human robots using trauma-based mind-control *end* According to 
an ex-Programmer the Programmers for decades have been treated like 
royalty whenever they step foot onto a military base or enter a hospital 
that carries out mind control *end* They are always expected *end* Generally the 
commanding general on a base would meet them and escort the 
programmer in a limo *end* If the base commander couldn’t make it an 
important physician might take his place *end* The programmers have keys and 
codes to get into special areas *end* After many thousands of Americans died in 
WW II fighting Nazism our government’s intelligence agencies incl *end* the 
military intelligence groups in cooperation with the Illuminati and its 
people in the Vatican smuggled  of the worst Nazi-fascist war 
criminals into this country *end* This is on public record now *end* Part of this was 
under Operation Paperclip *end* 

The DoD Dept *end* of Defense also worked at smuggling Nazi mind control 
programmers under Project  *end* Every W.W *end* II veteran who fought ought 

to be angry that after putting his life on the line for "democracy" and 
freedom and supposedly defeating the Nazis our government brought in 
men like the S.S.’s infamous butcher Dr *end* Joseph Mengele to program 
American children with trauma-based mind-control like he had in the 
concentration camps *end* In fact Fritz has worked with an Illuminati victim of 
Joseph Mengele who was programmed in Germany in a concentration 
camp and then smuggled to the U.S *end* via Canada by Jesuits working with 
the Illuminati *end* Once in the U.S *end* this person continued to be programmed 
by Mengele who went by many names including Dr *end* Green *end* He is 
described in detail in part d *end* of this Appendix *end* We must begin to get 
beyond the fronts and covers that the programmers have for the world *end* 

Jewish professor Ernst Bergmann of the infamous Leipzig University is 
also surprisingly a strong advocate of Nazism *end* His main book is A 
National Socialist Philosophy of Culture *end* He writes "A new type of 
mankind is being developed." He is mentioned here so that people stop 
looking at labels and start looking at what is really going on *end*

Ahnerbe of the Nazis was set up to do genetic research and experiments *end* 
And one element of that was to be able to create the prefect obedient mind-
controlled slave *end* A first glance at the lies told us by our press will give one 
the impression Nazism was anti-communist nationalistic & Christian *end*

that Nazism is Socialism or Marxism exactly what communism is about 
and that Nazism is not nationalistic but international in its view *end* Further it 
is Satanic and based on the Nordic mystery beliefs Odin Thor etc. *end* It is 
not based on Christianity *end*

Force *end* What Light force *end* Lucifer the light bearer’s light force *end* The true 
nature of Nazism is being concealed *end* When Hitler came to plan he was 
placed into power in accordance with the Illuminati plan which was 
spelled out in writing *end* This plan said "Nowadays if any state raise a 
protest against us it is only pro forma provided in advance at our 
discretion and by our direction for their anti-semitism is indispensable to 
us for the management of our lesser brethren."

Understanding The Programmers

Many men have contributed to the research of trauma-based mind control *end* 
The men who learned how to torture during the ancient Babylonian days 
during the Roman days and during the Medieval days passed their secrets 
to the rulers of the secret Mystery Religions *end* Some of the  Illuminati 
bloodlines trace their history back to the ancient times of Babylon *end* 

Because the programmers are driven by the spirit-world they are very 
jealous and competitive towards each other *end* It is a dog-eat-dog world 
amongst them *end* The demonic forces within in them are in competition too *end* 
Yes the programmers have had their friction their jealousies & power 
struggles with each other *end* Some of these inner battles have been fought 
with and over their mind-controlled slaves *end* 

When two programmers work on a single slave they might both put in 
their own secret back doors to insure that the slave remains loyal to 
himself rather than other programmer *end* There has also been ongoing tension 
between the half-blooded & full blooded Illuminati programmers *end* Because 
each of the various programming centers specializes in perhaps a dozen 
types of programming programmers go to different programming centers *end* 

The props for the scripts are often kept at the programming centers *end* The 
programmers will dress according to the script they are giving the victims 
which might mean they may be dressed as the Wizard of Oz a Nazi a 
doctor in a white coat a white rabbit costume a corrigan sweater as Mr *end* 
Rogers or in the nude *end* 

One of the most cruelest evil geniuses in recent times was Dr *end* Mengele *end* 
Dr *end* Mengele used  twins during the time of - for research *end* 
Most of these twins died *end* The twins were chosen out of the vast numbers 

of people who were brought in to the German concentration camps *end* By the 
time W.W *end* II ended Mengele knew a great deal about how to torture 
children in order to get them to bond totally with him *end* Even today some of 
the survivors of his horrible experiments believe that Mengele loved 
children *end* They love him as their father *end* 

Mengele also developed the ability to create artificial twinning between 
two people *end* Mengele carried his violin with him when he came onto 
military bases *end* His violin hid his color bands and probes for color 
programming *end* 

Other men worked with Dr *end* Mengele and soon became programmers in 
their own right *end* Dr *end* Cameron of Canada became a Monarch mind-
controlled slave programmer known as Dr *end* White *end* 

Another programmer who was not a full blooded generational Satanist was 
Gog known as Dr *end* Blue *end* Heinrich Mueller is known as Dr *end* Blue *end* Dr *end* Blue 
lived in the northwest area and has two sons--their programming and cult 
nicknames are Teddy Bear Theodore and Robin Hood Michael *end* 

Two programmers known successively as Dr *end* Black are L.W *end* and W.B *end* A 
protege of L *end* W *end* is Ed Hummel who works in states such as Texas and 
Oregon *end* Ed was originally from Texas and W *end* and B *end* were originally 
from Oklahoma before they began working in the Northwest *end*

Lewis and Michael Aquino *end* These two men are as cold blooded as they 
come ranking right beside Mengele in their ability to torture *end* Michael 
Aquino DOB //  Leavenworth St *end* San Francisco plus other

slaves *end*

Dr *end* Green Dr *end* Joseph Mengele

The most significant programmer perhaps one could give him the title of 
the father of Monarch Programming was Joseph Mengele an ex-Nazi 
Concentration Camp doctor *end* Thousands of Monarch mind-controlled 
slaves in the U.S *end* had "Dr *end* Green" as their chief programmer *end* 

Physically the doctor was ’" dark-brown hair greenish brown eyes and 
gracefully handsome *end* He was a Dr *end* Jekyll-Mr *end* Hyde character who 
disarmed people by his kindness *end* He was gentle and quiet and intelligent 
while still having a very sadistic brutal side to him *end* Joseph Mengele was 
born into a wealthy Satanic bloodline and became one of the most 
powerful Satanists in the world *end* He was an expert on demonology and the 
Cabala *end* He was at least a Grand Master in the Illuminati but how high he 
went up the hierarchy ladder is unknown to this author *end* Because he was 
part of the Illuminati and their bodies are not to have visible scars Joseph 
Mengele did not take the SS tatoo on his body when he joined the Nazi SS *end* 

Mengele became the camp doctor at the famous Auschwitz Concentration 

Camp *end* Joseph Mengele was in a very key position as the camp doctor at 
Auschwitz *end* He was able to use countless thousands of people as guinea 
pigs for experiments *end* One of the chief items that had to be charted in detail 
was how much torture various humans could take *end* The charts were worked 
up so that the Illuminati would know exactly how much torture and how 
much nurturing to carry out in creating trauma-based mind-controlled 
slaves *end* 

After Joseph grew up in Gunzberg with a family noted for their secrecy 
and an abusive mother he studied at Frankfurt-am-Main which is a satanic 
stronghold in Germany *end* He interned at Leipzig a town known for being 
the site of modern leaming theories *end* Later he joined the SA and then later 
the SS *end* 

At the end of W.W *end* II the United States army took custody of Mengele 
and the secret satanists of the satanic brotherhood got Mengele quietly 
smuggled into the U.S *end* Mengele was given a higher profile in South 
America to lead people to think that he spent his time in South America *end* 
Actually Mengele spent a great deal of time travelling worldwide 
especially to places like Tavistock and China Lake’s Naval Intelligence 
base where Monarch slaves were created from innocent children *end* Although 
Mengele did indeed live in Brazil Argentina and Paraguay a great deal of 
misinformation and disinformation has been dumped on the world by the 
CIA and other groups working for the Illuminati *end* 

Mengele continued to love music and dancing throughout his life *end* He 
became a human puppetmaster who used music to program with *end* He liked 
both the violin and the piano *end* He did lots of musical key-tones 
programming *end* 
Some of his proteges also used music to program with *end* This bent toward 
using music then contributed to the fact that the American country western 
industry is an outgrowth of the Monarch program *end* The country western 
industry is a cover for the drug running done via Monarch slaves *end* 

Another bent of Mengele’s also contributed to a direction that the Monarch 
program took *end* Mengele was fascinated by twins and twinning *end* Mengele 

experimented on thousands of twins most of who died from the torture of 
the experiments *end* Science experiments need two groups one of which is a 
control group *end* Twins make research easy *end* Mengele used them extensively *end* 
He was developing along with some German and Italian researchers the 
capability to trauma bond people to their abuser to such an extent that the 
victim would be totally loyal to their abuser *end* During episodes in the camps 
when Mengele saved people from execution by the S.S *end* some of those 
people remained loyal to him to this day in spite of an awareness of how 
many people he cruelly tortured to death *end* 

Monarch slaves are programmed to think they have a twin somewhere *end* 
Many of them have been twinned into  person and  person teams also *end* 
Mengele was known by people in the camps by his victims as the Angel of 
Death Vater father Vaterchen daddy and Schoner Joseph beautiful 
Joseph *end* Monarch mind-controlled slave victims who were programmed by 
him know him by names such as Doctor Green Papa David and Fairchild *end* 
Monarch slaves remember the cadence of his shiny black boots as he 
marched back and forth while programming them *end* 

Whether programming in a lab or experimenting on humans Dr *end* Mengele 
enjoyed reducing people to the level of animals *end* However many times his 
victims were restrained from crying tears *end* Mengele is well-known by his 
Monarch victims for his daisy game programming *end* He would pull off a 
daisy and say I love you." Then he would pull of one and say I love you 
not." When the last daisy petal came out I love you not" he would then kill 
a small child in front of the child he was programming *end* 

Mengele was in Dallas during the killing of JFK which was achieved by 
trained Monarch slaves *end* In fact the Beaumont TX Enterprise on Mon *end* 
April  ’ in the Metro Sect *end* B on page B cont *end* to b reports that a 
sworn affidavit exists where a man connects Joseph Mengele with 
Kennedy’s death and to have seen Mengele at the Texas Book 
Depository *end* Luis Angel Castillo was just one of the Monarch mind-
controlled slaves sent to kill JFK on Nov *end*  ’ *end* A woman from 
Germany named Mrs *end* Krebs along with a host of other programmers 
worked with Mengele on the Kennedy assassination *end* In  as part of the 
ongoing deception and also showing the audacity of the Illuminati Joseph 

Mengele applied and got an Argentinean foreign resident permit under his 
own name *end* He even travelled to Europe to various countries in  using 
his own name *end* 
Dr *end* White Dr *end* D *end* Ewen Cameron

Dr *end* White was the cover name for D *end* Ewen Cameron b *end* Dec *end*   - 
Sept *end*He was born in Scotland was tall imposing & blue eyed 
liked whiskey and wore custom-made suits *end* He called women "Lassie." 
His favorite book growing up was Frankenstein it is said that 
Frankenstein inspired him to go into psychiatry *end* 
Cameron was president of the powerful American Psychiatric Association 
and later the president of the Canadian Psychiatric Association and then 
later the first president of the World Association of Psychiatrists *end* He was 
chairman of the Canadian Scientific Planning Committee *end* Dr *end* D *end* Ewen 
Cameron of Montreal Canada was Dr *end* White when carrying out Monarch 
programming *end* 

Cameron tried to continue some of Mengele’s eye color research in 
Canada *end* Mengele was trying to discover for the Nazi’s how to make brown 
eyes blue *end* Cameron received funding from the Illuminati *end* Cameron also 
got funding from the CIA *end* The Rockefeller Foundation gave him  
in  to create the Allen Memorial Institute for psychiatry an Illuminati 
front *end* He began doing programming early in the s *end* Cameron had 
served on the gruesome western front in W.W.I *end* 

As an Illuminati kingpin and programmer Cameron Dr *end* White was very 
sadistic and cold blooded *end* He visited other programmers on the West 
Coast periodically *end* One leading canadian doctor said that Cameron "was 
not possessed of the necessary sense of humanity to be regarded as a good 
doctor." The man was able to instill fear into people by looking at them *end* 
He met frequently with Allen Dulles the head of the CIA *end* He travelled 
frequently including making stops in Washington *end* 

Many of the Monarch slaves on the east coast were victims of Cameron *end* 
He worked long hours at his mind-control work like a driven man *end* In  

just one of Cameron’s institutions administered under his supervision 
 electrical shocks to patients *end* This is just what was recorded at one 
institution for one year *end* Who knows how many victims got electrical 
shocks and programming by this man *end* 

He worked with the Jesuit part of the NWO in Canada *end* Leonard 
Rubenstein was one of his trusted assistants *end* Cameron encouraged 
dissension among his staff in divide and Conquer tactics to maintain his 
power *end* Cameron had a big ego that allowed him to steal other people’s 
work and give himself credit for it in his publications *end*

The Anti-Christ
Chief handler/programmer

 

 The AntiChrist will have both public and private lives *end* The two will 
not be the same *end* Deep in the heart of the AntiChrist he will want to rob 
kill and destroy *end* 
 He will be a man of war but his public image will be that he is a man 
of peace *end* 
 He will be a winner *end* The public always likes a winner *end* This will be a 
man with a hardened heart but a man of charisma *end* 
 Charisma has been noted to develop when a person is a foreigner 
novel and has some feature that causes people to feel sorry for the person 
--some wound or physical defect like Gorbachev's red splotch on his 
head *end* The AntiChrist will have the public appearance of being a genius 
not only a wizard of words but a commercial genius a military genius a 
diplomat of the highest order a leader and an intelligent good looking 
man *end* 
 However this is the public image *end* Some of this will be created by 
madison avenue techniques *end* He will be fearless

 a skilled negotiator a poker face who is capable of crafty deception *end* In 
fact deception characterizes the man *end* 

He is Satan in human flesh

 who will use religion for evil *end* He will use good for evil *end* 
 His lineage is from several directions *end* He may have Hittite blood

 blood from the Tribe of Dan 

 and blood from Assyria *end* 

 He may also claim to have Egyptian royal blood *end* 

 He will be proclaimed the returning messiah for the Buddhists the 
Islamic religion the New Agers the Christians etc *end* Inman Mahdi the 
Messiah *end* etc *end* However the group of people who he will be most 
connected to will be the Jews *end* 
 His sphere of influence will not just be jews but he will reinstitute 
blood sacrifices in the Temple in Jerusalem *end* 

 This may well be the abomination of desolation that the Word of God 
warns about *end* 

 The AntiChrist will arise on the scene like a thief in the night 

 and will surprise people by his rise to fame *end* He will come from 
obscurity --

 but he will have all the correct credentials 

 and bloodlines *end* 

 All the correct occult signs will occur around this individual *end* 
 Because of historical precedence we know that chaos and confusion 
will set the stage for the grand entrance of this man onto the stage of public 
attention *end* 

Problems will be created so that this great man can pull mankind out 
of the worst disasters *end* The world will be trauma-bonded with him *end* 
 He will be a savior saving mankind from extinction and death *end* 
However while he promises and provides a new life for humankind he is 
actually a merchant of spiritual death *end* 
 The eternal fate of individuals is determined by how they respond to 
him *end* 
 A remnant of true believers will endure to the end

 but many will succumb to the deception *end* 
 The AntiChrist will not have to face a hostile church--the church will 
be in apostasy and will accept him *end* 
 The AntiChrist will have to face a few John the Baptist types who he 
will use his guillotines on *end* 
 In other words the AntiChrist will not be antagonistic toward the 
church--but he will subtly destroy it and cause it to serve only him *end* 
He will disregard the true law of God

--the spirit of the law but he will be a legalist who wants law and 
order

 *end* He will have both a False Prophet and another close friend the Beast *end* 
 The daily blood sacrifices will become the global correct view and 
Christians who oppose these sacrifices will be in trouble *end* 
 All the trappings of Rabbinic and Talmudic and Cabalistic Judaism 
will be revived and flourish *end* 
 He will pretend to be like Christ--he will be compared to Christ in the 
media--but he will also be opposed in reality to everything Christ stands 
for *end* As so many Satanic cult leaders do and as is standard within 
Illuminati rituals--the AntiChrist will be killed and brought back to life *end* 
 This simulated death will be done in front of the public and this will 
give him the appearance of superhuman strength and divine favor--for 
being able to receive a deadly wound and then to heal and revive so 

quickly *end* Jerusalem will be the religious capital of the New World Order 

--but there is reason to believe that there will also be both a political 
and an economic capital and a computer and a police center *end* 
 There will probably be  public capitals and many other centers 

 Just as during the Roman Empire there were many religious centers 
such as Ephesus was the spiritual center for Diana worship being one of 
the  wonders of the Ancient world *end* Mt *end* Olympus in Greece was a sacred 
mountain in ancient times with sites for consultations with the Oracles *end* In 
modern AntiChrist times Glastonbury UK and Mt *end* Shasta CA may serve 
as spiritual centers *end* The New Age pilgrimages to Mt *end* Shasta which are 
covers for the mind control done there may well continue to serve that 
same function in the AntiChrist's reign *end* 
 Rome or London could become political capitals *end* An economic 
capital could be established almost anywhere *end* The computers are already 
being centered in Europe *end* Once he has taken power he can enter into 
Jerusalem like a hero triumphantly *end* 
 He will command universal worship via the technological advances 
that have been made in communication *end* All the spirits of evil will collect 
themselves in this one person of evil *end* He will be shrewd and will be able 
to understand dark evil things *end* He will do things according to his own will *end* 
At least some outside of the inner circle will know that he is homosexual 
and bi-sexual *end* 
 He will have the full force of the world's system behind him trying to 
make him look better *end* He may be born in the Middle East --perhaps in 
Pakistan like Lord Maitreya Rahmat Ahmad *end*

 For instance Antiochus IV Epiphanes Caligula Nero Ghulam 
Alimad and Hitler *end* However these have been only partial manifestations *end*

state propaganda *end* 

I mention all these things because again this was a partial manifestation of 
the AntiChrist spirit along with the Beast and the False Prophet *end* Those

Scotty’s Castle is a castle located in Death Valley CA *end* It has a very

The man who built Scotty’s Castle was Walter Perry Scott -
 *end* Walter P *end* Scott was the son of an alcohol distiller and horse 
breeder in Kentucky *end* Walter did not get any formal education *end* He 
left home and went west where he worked as a mule driver and a 
water boy *end* From there he became a horse wrangler *end* Because of his 
talent with horses Buffalo Bill made him the feature rider along with 
Annie Oakley in Buffalo Bill’s family show *end* The show travelled and 
Scotty was with it eleven years *end* During this time Scotty made many 
important friendships with men of power and wealth *end* In  
Walter married and left the show *end* He got a loan from Julian Gerard 
a NY banker to go prospecting for gold which he failed to pay back *end* 
Julian Gerard was repeatedly sending people to hassle Scotty to get 
his money back *end* In  Walter Scott "Scotty" scattered gold 
nuggets and  bills from N.Y *end* to L.A *end* Where he got all this gold 
and  bills is a mystery but it wasn’t from prospecting *end* The idea 
of finding a secret mine was very obviously a cover for however 
Scotty managed to get his money *end* Scotty is well-known for his 
penchant to throw away  gold pieces as if they were candy 
wherever he went *end* 

Nobody believed he had a mine strangely the IRS never got 
interested in Scotty *end* Why *end* The IRS went after Charles Caughlin 
who was exposing the elite the bankers the Freemasons etc *end* in the 
early ’s on his radio show *end* There was no reason to suspect

the IRS actually owed Caughlin money *end* However the national 
papers printed front page stories of the IRS investigation and 
practically ignored that the man was exonerated *end* Yet the IRS left 

Scotty alone *end* Hmmm *end*

In  construction secretly began on a castle in Death Valley *end* The 
best of materials were used and the materials had to be hauled clear 
out in the desert by truck to Grapevine Canyon where the castle sits *end* 
Hundreds of workers were hired *end* The castle got its kitchen tiles from 
Spain *end* Special rugs were made on the European island of Majorca 
for the castle *end* Tiles for the incompleted pool came from the 
Mediterranean *end* Many of the furnishing of the castle came from 
cathedrals and palaces in Spain and Morocco *end* Draperies made for 
the castle were hand-tooled in selected sheepskin leather *end* Sixty hand-
carved panels each of a different design were installed in the music-
room ceiling *end* A Welte Mignon organ reported to have cost  
--the finest of its kind in Western United States was placed in the 
music room even though Scotty could not play the organ *end* Twelve 
bathrooms were installed *end* Several kitchens were installed *end* Tunnels 
and secret rooms were built under the buildings *end* Around  million 
dollars of that time period were spent on building the castle 
supposedly from Scotty’s "gold mine." The castle became known as 
Scotty’s Castle *end* It is ideal as a Satanic ritual site *end* It can 
accommodate numerous people *end* It is remote *end* It has hidden rooms 
and areas and tunnels *end*

We have just touched the surface of the vest network of programming 
sites *end* Two examples of an entire series of programming sites-- the Coast 
to Coast campground resorts and  the Jesuit-run institutions which are 
often programming sites incl *end* Jesuit College WV *end* An example of the 

former is the Park City Diamond Caverns *end* KT Coast to Coast resort which 
has had a sensory deprivation tank headphones for state of the art 
harmonic programming *end* etc *end* These membership camp sites are used to 
program children *end* Nor have we touched upon the large numbers of 
programmed Russians & Eastern Europeans that are coming Into this 
nation *end* When this book was written more people immigrated to the U.S *end* 
from Russia than anywhere else *end* Europe is teeming with programming 
sites including the Vatican *end* Sebulun Zuflucht in Marienheide Germany is 
about the only European attempt at deprogramming *end*

BIBLIOGRAPHY & SOURCES

The co-authors bring much experience and study with this subject into the 
creation of this book *end* The sources that have contributed to their knowledge 
would take a book as long as this to list every source that has gotten them 
to their understanding of the subject *end* 
PRIMARY SOURCES ON PRIMARY SUBJECT-- TRAUMA-BASED 
TOTAL MIND-CONTROL

witchcraft and the various aspects of control *end*

Carole Goettman George B *end* Greaves and Philip M *end* Croons put out a 
reference book Multiple Personality & Dissociation - A 
Complete Bibliography nd edition *end* Lutherville MD The Sidran Press 
 *end* Co-author Fritz has gone through the Bibliography which lists in 
 pages essentially all the articles ever published on MPD and 
Dissociation and he has read all that he could obtain via the large research 
libraries *end* Dozens of the articles and many of the books which appear in 
this complete bibliography have been read *end* Most of the professional 
literature on the subject is trash *end* During the s Americans got 
interested in Multiple Personalities after having lost interest in the subject 
as W.W *end* I got started *end* I believe the therapeutic community was probably 
nudged by the military/intelligence agencies to lose interest when W.W *end* I 

broke out and that anyone who did get interested got scooped up into the 
government during W.W *end* II and the Cold War *end* Some of the helpful 
professional papers have been notated in the book itself *end* A perusal of the 
index will provide part of the sources for this book *end*

These sources will have to remain confidential *end* Over a dozen Illuminati 
slaves provided notes from what they have found out about their lives and 
mind-control systems *end* The co-authors have interviewed and personally 
known dozens more who have been visited with *end* Notes were kept on some 
of these interviews *end* Fritz taped some of his interviews and in more than 
one case got a computer disk of the person’s life story with colloborating 
evidence *end*

 *end* Books on Associated Topics

Both authors have read many books on tangent subjects *end* The list of books 
that have been read and researched prior to writing this would take another 
book to record *end* The co-author Fritz found himself consulting his own 
books Be Wise As Serpents  The Top  Illuminati Bloodlines Vol *end* 
  and Exodus -  *end* The co-authors purchased and read 
the  Oz books *end* They also have a number of the other books used for 
scripts such as Mother Goose Rhymes The Tall Book of Make Believe -
Michael Aquino’s version of Star Wars etc *end* Snow White & the  Dwarfs 
The Island of the Blue Dolphins Through the Looking Glass etc *end* Fritz 
purchased his own copy of The Graphic Work of M *end* C *end* Esher *end* NY 
Ballantine Books rd edition  *end* in order to have on hand the artwork 
which contains so many mirror images and inversions and is so often used 
for programming *end* 
As I Fritz sit down to provide the sources for the reader it is apparent that 
the task is beyond my time restraints *end* Knowledge accumulates *end* A random 
sample of just two of almost countless references looked at to come to the 
author’s level of understanding would be Jean L *end* Sutton’s workshop book 
Ritualistic Abuse of Children Identification and Case Management 
Strategies which was used in workshops for teachers and child services 
division people on Fri *end* Sept *end*   at  N.E *end* Davis St *end* Portland OR *end* 
Another example is The New Yorker’s May   article 
"Remembering Satan--Part II" *end* Neither one was referred to in writing the 
book but these two and countless others over the years form the 
accumulation of understanding that is needed to tackle writing a book on 
Multiple Personality Disorder Dissociative Identity Disorder *end* 
To be able to write this book Fritz the co-author has studied material

Also I Fritz have spent time examining the Word of God to try to 
understand what God’s written word revealed by His Spirit would teach 
me about this situation *end* There are numerous Bible verses that pertain to the 
information in this book which are not referred to in this volume *end* The 
primary issues created by the traumas are a *end* identity issues and b *end* issues 
concerning fellowship with God *end* Much of the trauma and programming is 
cloud the issue of who the person really is and how they can have a 
beneficial relationship to God Almighty *end* 

The Bill Gothard Basic Youth Seminar which the co-author Fritz has 
attended  times has been very helpful to him to understand what the 
programmers do and how they strip a person of what they need to be 
spiritually strong *end* In fact Fritz knows a number of the programmers have 
attended the Bill Gothard Seminar themselves and know how to use 
beneficial information for evil purposes *end* 

Likewise the Christian can take the occult knowledge of revealed in this 
book and use it for good instead of the evil that it was designed for *end* The 
Institute has a hard volume reference book on Research in Principles of 
Lfe as well as a workbook *end* 

Cisco the other co-author has studied MPD SRA Bible issues and 
occult topics in depth *end* Her personal knowledge added a depth to the book 
that could not have been achieved without her *end* 

William Frost of San Antonio TX was a good friend of a tall lean Texan 
named David Hill *end* David Hill had been taken in by Mafia boss Joseph 
Bonanno who was as a surrogate father to him *end* After David Hill became a 
Christian he used his first hand knowledge of the Mafia the occult world 
such as his Masonic experience to put the pieces together about the NWO *end* 
He had just completed a very detailed manuscript for a book exposing the 
NWO when he was murdered *end* After David’s murder William Frost was 
able to retrieve David’s manuscript and sent me a copy *end* The death was not 
ruled a murder by the authorities but men who have written lengthy 
exposes on the New World Order do not commit suicide before they get 
their books published *end* 

It was keen-minded David Hill who warned Billy Graham for many hours 
about the New World Order only to be told by Billy Graham that Billy 
was ‘a captive’ Graham’s own words of the New World Order *end* The 
information William Frost gave me about David Hill was later verified in 
many ways by Joseph Bonanno’s surprising autobiography A Man of 
Honor Simon & Schuster Rockefeller Center N.Y *end*

It’s somewhat unusual for Mafia chiefs to write autobiographies *end* In it 
Joseph Bonanno says he looked up to Billy Graham and that David Hill 
joined up with Billy Graham *end* In  Billy Graham came to Joseph 
Bonanno’s house in Tuscon with David *end* Graham sent him a Christmas 
card every year and called him soon after his wife died to offer 
condolences *end* These things are mentioned on page  of his 
autobiography *end* David Hill’s manuscript was encouraging to me Fritz 
because he verified many of the same things that I’d found *end* His manuscript 
was quoted in Vol *end*  concerning the top families *end* 
Information about the names of programmers and programming sites and 
the Temple of Set membership has come from recovering victims of 
Trauma-based mind-control *end* Information about Illuminati bloodlines 
ritual sites and important buildings has also come from Illuminati 
members who are recovering from Illuminati mind-control *end* Many more 
witnesses to Illuminati Mind-control will come forward if people learn 
how to help these people and to believe the things that have happened to 
them *end* Now that this legitimate information is being circulated it can be 
expected that "witnesses" with bogus information/bogus memories will 
come forward to detract from the credibility of this book *end*
